cn.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

cn.description:
JANDARMA VE SAHİL GÜVENLİK PERSONEL SINAVI JSPS PRO

ŞİMDİ KAZANMA ZAMANI!!!

JSPS PRO, Jandarma ve Sahil Güvenlik personelinin astsubaylığa geçiş, ihtisas ve misyon koruma sınavlarına hazırlanması amacıyla geliştirilmiş, kapsamlı bir eğitim ve bilgi platformudur.
Ayrıca, görevdeki personelin jandarma mevzuat konularına her an erişebilmesini sağlayarak mesleki gelişime katkı sunar.

UYGULAMA ÖZELLİKLERİ

*Güncel Kanun ve Yönetmelikler
Uygulama içerisinde yer alan tüm mevzuat sürekli güncellenmektedir. Her konudan binlerce soru bulunmakta olup, soru sayıları düzenli olarak artırılmaktadır.

* Özet Anlatımlar
Zamanın Yoksa dert etme özetler ile hazırlanmaya başla.

*Video Dersler
JSPS sınavına yönelik uzman eğitmenler tarafından hazırlanmış video derslere erişim imkânı sunulmaktadır.

*Sesli Anlatım Özelliği
Konuları dilediğiniz yerde dinleyerek zamanınızı verimli kullanabilir ve öğrenme sürecinizi hızlandırabilirsiniz.

*Bilgi Kartları
JSPS için Pratik Yapın, Konu tekrarlarını kolaylaştıran, öğrenmeyi kalıcı hale getiren bilgi kartları yer almaktadır.

*Gerçek Sınav Formatında Denemeler
Uygulamada sınav formatına uygun 100 soruluk denemeler bulunmaktadır. Bu denemeler sınava hazırlıkta önemli bir avantaj sağlar.

*Sınav Takvimi ve Bildirimler
Sınav tarihleri, yapılması gereken işlemler ve güncel duyurular anlık bildirimlerle kullanıcıya iletilir.

*Yapay Zekâ Asistanı
Sınav konularıyla ilgili merak ettiğiniz soruları yöneltebileceğiniz yapay zekâ asistanı sınav emriyle aktif hale gelir ve sınırlı süreyle kullanılabilir.

*Favorilerim, Yapılacaklar, Haberler ve Bilgilendirme Alanları
Uygulama içerisinde kişisel çalışma planı oluşturabilir, ilerlemenizi takip edebilir ve güncel gelişmelerden haberdar olabilirsiniz.

JANDARMA VE SAHİL GÜVENLİK MESLEK BİLGİSİ MODÜLÜ

Bu modül, görev sırasında ihtiyaç duyulan tüm bilgilere tek platform üzerinden ulaşma imkânı sağlar.

* Asayiş olaylarında anlık bilgi edinme
* Savunma, cezalar ve idari işlemler hakkında bilgi
* Güncel kanun ve yönetmeliklere erişim
* İdari para cezaları hakkında bilgi
* 30’dan fazla tahkikat dosyası (örnek: kasten öldürme, mala zarar verme vb.)
* Adli ve idari tahkikat hazırlama rehberi
* Tutanak hazırlama örnekleri
* Suç tasnifleri hakkında bilgi (kişilere karşı suçlar, mala karşı suçlar vb.)
* Trafik idari para cezaları hakkında detaylı bilgi
* Silah bilgisi ve kullanma yetkileri
* Kolluk etik ilkeleri
* Dilekçe ve üst yazı örnekleri

Bu özellikler sayesinde personel, görev sırasında ihtiyaç duyduğu bilgilere kolayca ulaşabilir.

NEDEN JSPS PRO?

* Kitap taşıma zorunluluğunu ortadan kaldırır.
* Güncel kanun ve yönetmeliklere ücretsiz erişim sağlar.
* Tüm kuvvet personelinin kullanabileceği en kapsamlı mobil uygulamadır.
* Kullanıcı geri bildirimlerine göre düzenli olarak güncellenir.

UYGULAMANIN KAPSADIĞI SINAVLAR

* Sözleşmeli Subaylıktan Muvazzaf Subaylığa Geçiş Sınavı
* Sözleşmeli Astsubaylıktan Muvazzaf Astsubaylığa Geçiş Sınavı
* Jandarma İhtisas Branş Sınavı
* Jandarma Misyon Koruma Sınavı
* Uzman Jandarmalıktan Astsubaylığa Geçiş Sınavı
* Uzman Erbaşlıktan Astsubaylığa Geçiş Sınavı
* Muvazzaf Subay ve Astsubay Sınavları
* Sözleşmeli Subay ve Astsubay Sınavları

JSPS PRO – ÖĞRENMENİN KALICILIĞINI ARTIRIN

Tüm bilgiler, mevzuatlar, sorular ve örnek dosyalar tek bir uygulamada toplanmıştır.
JSPS PRO ile sınavlara hazırlanmak artık çok daha kolay, sistematik ve etkili.

cn.description:
Incredibox 可让你在一群酷帅的 beatbox 歌手的帮助下打造属于自己的音乐。选择你喜欢的音乐风格，开始创作、录制并分享你的混音作品。尽情享受嘻哈节拍、电波、流行人声、爵士摇摆、巴西节奏等众多美妙的音乐节拍。此外，还可以探索由社区创作的一系列模组。丰富的内容让你沉浸于混音创作数小时，且不含广告，没有微交易。

如游戏般好玩，又如工具般实用，Incredibox 让用户拥有了全新的音频和视觉体验，并迅速受到所有年龄层人士的欢迎。音乐、图像、动画和交互性的完美组合，使 Incredibox 成為每個人的首選。同时，由于 Incredibox 寓教于乐，现在其已在世界各地的学校广泛使用。

如何使用？很简单！只需将图标拖放到人物身上，即可让他们开始演唱，并混合出属于你自己的音乐！找到正确的音乐节奏组合，即可解锁不同的动画合唱来帮助你提高混音技巧。

一旦你对你的作品感到满意，请保存并分享，获取尽可能多的票数。如果你的作品获得足够的票数，那么你可以登上 Top 50 排行榜，从而在 Incredibox 载入史册。准备好露一手了吗？

在 App 中，你可以将混音作品下载为 MP3 文件，随时聆听和欣赏！

懒得制作自己的混音作品？没问题，自动模式能为你播放乐曲！

大声嗨起来 ;)

****************
Incredibox 是法国里昂 So Far So Good 工作室的智慧结晶，于 2009 年创建。以网页开始，随后发布手机和平板电脑 App，并立即成为热门话题。它荣获数个奖项，并出现在多个国际媒体上，包括：BBC、Adobe、FWA、Gizmodo、Slate、Konbini、Softonic、Kotaku、Cosmopolitan、PocketGamer、AppAdvice、AppSpy、Vice、Ultralinx 等等。自创建以来，其在线试玩版已吸引了超过一亿访客。

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力

cn.description:
随时随地，行侠仗义！《大侠立志传》是半瓶神仙醋开发的开放世界武侠RPG游戏。这是一款像素版江湖生存模拟器，你将扮演一个初出茅庐的市井小人物，体验多样身份，在江湖中摸爬滚打，最终脱颖而出。

【游戏特色】
- 百余种武学功法，拳掌刀剑，枪棍音律，内外兼修，皆可自行搭配。成为十字坡剑圣，亦可精通百家所长。
- 多分支走向。游戏中没有真正意义上的主线，在充满抉择的江湖中从心选择吧。
- 丰富的NPC交互玩法，结交五都侠客（侣），游走于盘杂的人际势力，经营你的江湖关系网。
- 奇遇和危险并存的真实武林。江湖并非非黑即白，遇事不一定要用拳头解决，采取多种方式应对，并坦然接受不一样的结局。
- 充满烟火气息的像素武侠世界。游戏中有着自然流逝的时间，各色NPC都有自己独立的行为AI。

cn.releaseNotes: Minor fixes to help improve your experience using the app
cn.description:
Train your brain to listen carefully with this professional speech therapy app. Three activities help you to understand sentences, follow directions, and improve language processing. If you’re looking for a speech therapy app for adults and older children with communication and cognitive impairments that takes understanding beyond single words, this app is for you. 

** Try for FREE by downloading Advanced Language Therapy Lite **

Advanced Comprehension Therapy will help you find where comprehension breaks down, then help you build it back up with 3 classic speech therapy activities targeting sentence-level listening and reading comprehension.

1) IDENTIFY the picture that matches the sentence, increasing in syntactic complexity. Start by finding the picture that matches a sentence like “The baby sleeps.” Work up to finding “The grandparent is told a secret by the child” from closely related pictures.

* 11 levels of difficulty for understanding sentences with nearly 700 unique trials
* Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension
* Includes up to 3 nouns, indirect objects, reversible sentences, & passives

2) BUILD a sentence by focusing on each word & how they all fit together. Arrange the words one-by-one to match the pictured sentence you hear. Start with 3 words and work up to 9.

* 20 sentence types in nearly 1200 unique trials
* Add up to 3 extra words for an added challenge
* Tricky "little words" like articles, pronouns, and prepositions
* Hear each word as you touch it

3) FOLLOW directions of increasing difficulty in 1-, 2-, & 3-step commands. Start with exercises like “Touch the pencil.” Work up to brain-bending challenges like “Before you touch the large yellow striped circle, touch the small blue solid star.” 

* 16 levels of difficulty for following directions
* Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension
* Includes basic, temporal, & conditional commands in a hierarchy of 1-, 2-, & 3-step directions

In All Activities:

* Enjoy 1000’s of unique stimuli with hundreds of photos
* Use hints when you get stuck so you always finish successfully
* Track progress with detailed e-mail reports 
* Record yourself on-screen and send it when you’re finished
* Repeat audio at any time, or repeat slowly for easier understanding
* Designed with adults in mind but easy enough for children to use 
* No subscriptions, no monthly bills, no Wi-Fi needed

-------------------------------------------------
Who is Advanced Comprehension Therapy For?

* Speech-Language Pathologists
* Adults with Aphasia (mild-moderate)
* Stroke & TBI Survivors
* Children with Autism or Language Learning Difficulties
* Anyone who has mastered the single words in Comprehension Therapy or Language 4-in-1 & wants to take their therapy to the next level!

-------------------------------------------------
Which Skills Does This App Target?

* Auditory Comprehension (listening)
* Reading Comprehension 
* Attention to Detail
* Working Memory (holding information)
* Nouns & Pronouns (he/she/it/they)
* Adjectives (colors, size, shading)
* Syntactic Processing (understanding grammar)
* Temporal Concepts (before/after)
* Conditional Directions (if/then)
* Problem Solving (using hint/repeat or fixing errors)

-------------------------------------------------
Download now to get started – or try it for FREE with Advanced Language Therapy Lite!

Looking for something different in a speech therapy app? We offer a wide range to choose from. Find the right one for you at tactustherapy.com/find

cn.releaseNotes: Initial support for the latest devices + some exciting news
cn.description:
Pro Camera by Moment is the manual camera app that gives you full creative control and professional-level performance, all at an affordable price. It brings us closer to what we love about our DSLR and mirrorless cameras – exposure controls, precise focus, rich colors, smooth video, crisp audio – without being complicated.

If you are looking for a powerful and easy-to-use camera app, Pro Camera is for you. We make it fast and intuitive to switch between modes, dial in your shot, and keep shooting. Plus, we give you all the manual controls you’ll need: shutter speed, ISO, white balance, focus, and more. Your favorite settings can be saved and recalled on demand.

For filmmakers – the features you need, not the ones you don’t. LUTs, color spaces, bitrates, dual-channel audio meters, real-time waveforms, fast access to frame rates, and more.

For photographers – easier than shooting on your DSLR. Shoot in RAW (even in bursts), capture brackets, and more. You can even create stunning timelapses and light trail effects (in-app purchase required). 

For everyone else – inspired by the pros we made the interface simple, fast, and easy to use. We provide getting started tips, video tutorials, and full-time customer service to get you set up.

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

GENERAL FEATURES
+ Full manual: control shutter speed, iso, exposure, focus, and white balance with easy-to-use sliders
+ Focus peaking: manually dial in your focus using highlighted in-focus regions
+ Zebra stripes: quickly determine over- and under-exposed areas in the viewfinder
+ Split focus and exposure: take control of tricky lighting scenarios
+ Viewfinder grid: choose from thirds, square, and golden ratio
+ Gyroscope: ensure your shot is level with an on-screen gyroscope and haptic feedback

PHOTOGRAPHY FEATURES
+ RAW and TIFF: shoot photos in RAW/ProRAW format for better editing, or TIFF for high-quality printing
+ RAW+JPG option: simultaneously get the best of both worlds
+ Burst mode: capture burst shots in RAW format – capture action while maintaining the uncompressed quality pros want with RAW
+ Bracketing: capture multiple exposures to stack later in your favorite editing apps

FILMMAKER FEATURES
+ Import, organize, and use your favorite LUTs
+ Color spaces: choose between Rec.709, Rec.2020 HDR, Display P3, and Apple Log (on compatible devices)
+ Codecs: shoot in HEVC, H.264, or any of the 422 ProRes variants
+ Video bitrates: get precise control over video quality with standard, medium, and high bitrate options
+ RGB histogram: dial in your video color, balance, and exposure
+ Waveform monitor: evaluate video brightness and exposure across your shot in real time
+ Audio meters: get just the right sound levels with real-time, precise, dual-channel audio levels
+ HDMI clean feed output: preview on a bigger screen
+ Video stabilization: make your videos buttery smooth
+ Video formats: change your resolution and frame rate on screen, without digging into a settings menu
+ Anamorphic: use the Moment Anamorphic lens to shoot amazing, letterbox style photos and videos, with a de-squeeze option built in

PREMIUM FEATURES (In-App Purchases)
+ Timelapse mode: capture stunning time-lapse videos
+ Slow Shutter mode: long exposure shots with motion blur or light trails

WORKS WITH
+ iPhone 16 Camera Control: get quick access to manual settings
+ Lens control: manually control which of the triple/dual lenses you want to shoot with so you can use Moment lenses over each one
+ Moment lenses: access options like anamorphic de-squeeze and distortion correction
+ Moment battery case: works with the DSLR-like shutter button on our photography cases for half-press and full-press capture. Take better photos, faster.
+ Apple Watch: use your watch as a remote to shoot photos or record videos
+ Siri Shortcuts: quick access to capture a photo or start a video

hk.description:
《勇者鬥惡龍III　傳說的起點……》，一款無論是評價還是銷量都堪稱頂峰的佳作，終於登陸到手機平台上了！
現在只需在手機上即可體驗到完整的洛特三部曲！

本作是一個完整的幻想世界，在裡面您可以體會到每個武器的奇妙，感受到每個咒文的壯觀。只需下載一次，便不用再購買也不用再下載任何其他東西！
《勇者鬥惡龍III　傳說的起點……》有著獨立的劇情，即使沒玩過《勇者鬥惡龍I》和《勇者鬥惡龍II》也可以體會到遊戲的樂趣。

◆ 序言
在16歲生日的早上，勇者奧爾特加的孩子覲見了阿拉罕的國王，並提出希望前往討伐魔王巴拉莫斯。
在旅途的前方有著什麼樣的試煉等待著我們的勇者呢，他是否能夠完成父親都沒有實現的任務？

◆ 遊戲特色

·自由編隊系統
任意選擇角色組隊，共同挑戰令人難忘的冒險！
名字、性別、職業，一切都可以自由設置！

·自由轉職
隊員可以設置為任意職業，每種職業都會有不同的狀態、裝備、技能以及能力。
儘管勇者命中註定無法轉職，但是其他角色都可以隨意轉換。
轉職之後該角色的等級會變回1級，但是在原職業中學會的技能和能力仍然會保留下來。
從僧侶轉為戰士可以給近戰系角色追加治療技能，一切組合都可以根據情況靈活變動！

·體會超過30小時的經典RPG體驗！
在各個大陸與迷宮中提升自己的等級，學會新的技能和能力。
每個人都能夠培養出獨一無二的隊伍。
同時還有收集小徽章換取強力道具的追加小遊戲。
在主線結束之後還能夠探索新的迷宮和場景。

·簡便的直接操作
遊戲操作經過調整可以完美對應現代移動設備的縱向佈局，移動按鍵的位置也可以在單手與雙手中切換。

·與日本乃至全世界數以百萬計的玩家一起回顧這款傳奇般的RPG！由著名遊戲製作人堀井雄二先生，偉大的作曲家椙山浩一先生，以及漫畫大師鳥山明先生攜手帶來的經典。

【對應OS】
iOS12.0及以上

hk.description:
在《聖劍傳說 Legend of Mana》這款動作RPG當中，成為主角的您將在「法‧迪爾」世界冒險。本作將以彷彿繪本般的畫面，配上幻想風的音樂，描述與系列主題「瑪那」息息相關的故事。
本作特色為「構築記憶之地」系統，只要在地圖上放置名為「聖遺物」的工藝品，就會出現城鎮、森林和居民，並展開新故事。一切故事發展都會隨著您「構築記憶之地」產生變化。

hk.description:
------------------------------------------------------
- As this application is very large, it will take some time to download.
- This application takes up around 2GB of memory. Over 4GB of free space is required to download it, so make sure that ample spare memory is available before attempting to do so. 
------------------------------------------------------

Recommended hardware:
iPhone 5s or later, 3rd generation iPad or later, iPad mini 2 or later, iPod touch 6

Supported OS:
iOS 8.0 or later
*Please be aware that users may experience problems, such as exceptionally slow running speeds, if running this application on devices other than those outlined in the recommended hardware section.  Such devices are not suited to playing this game and there is a chance of unforeseen errors occurring if running it on them.


Outline

The smash hit RPG: Final Fantasy VII, which has sold over 11,000,000 units* worldwide, finally arrives on iOS!
*Total includes both packaged sales and downloads.

The first Final Fantasy to feature 3D backgrounds and CG movie scenes, this dramatic tale continues to be loved by numerous fans around the world. Battle stages also appear in full 3D for the first time, bringing an even greater sense of awe and spectacle to combat!

Customize your characters in any way you like using the fantastic “material” system that allows endless combinations of spells and abilities.

This product is a port based on Final Fantasy VII for PC (No changes or additions have been made to the story). 


Story

With its unshakeable monopoly over Mako energy production, the evil Shinra Electric Power Company holds tight to the reigns of world power.
One day, a Mako reactor serving the sprawling metropolis of Midgar is attacked and destroyed in a bombing raid by a revolutionary group calling themselves Avalanche. 
Cloud Strife, a former member of Shinra’s elite “Soldier” unit takes part in the raid as a mercenary hired by Avalanche and sets events in motion that will draw him and his friends into an epic struggle for the fate of the planet itself…


Special features for the iOS edition 

- Play using a simple and comfortable virtual controller designed not to obscure the action, choosing between virtual analogue or fixed 4-way digital control pad options. The opacity of on-screen controls can also be adjusted from the Config Menu.

- Two new features to make play easier and more convenient!
The iOS edition also includes an option to turn enemy encounters off on the world and area maps (will not skip event battles) and a Max Stats command to become all-powerful in the blink of an eye.


Major game controls

Movement: Virtual joypad (Select between analogue and digital modes)
Menu navigation: Fixed digital buttons
Confirm: A button
Cancel: B button
Open menu: Y button

hk.releaseNotes: Fixed some minor bugs
hk.description:
《勇者鬥惡龍 怪物仙境3 魔族王子與艾爾芙的旅程》登陸智慧型手機！
 
用「勇者鬥惡龍」系列耳熟能詳的怪物組建隊伍，享受怪物間驚險刺激的戰鬥吧！不僅能把在原野上遇到的怪物納為夥伴，還能將怪物配種，孕育出只屬於自己的怪物。
在本作中將有超過500種怪物登場！
在本作當中，過去「勇者鬥惡龍 怪物仙境」系列作品的配種系統將全面進化，可以用全新的組合，孕育出各種耳熟能詳的怪物、魔王以及初次登場的怪物並納入夥伴。

為了成為最強的怪物大師，踏上旅程吧！
 
※手機版的通訊對戰功能不支援家機版的即時對戰內容「線上對戰」。
 
************************
 
【故事】
 
◆被下了詛咒的皮薩羅與可靠夥伴們的冒險記
 
皮薩羅的魔王父親對他下了「無法攻擊怪物」的詛咒，
因此他決心成為與怪物並肩作戰的怪物大師。
 
皮薩羅在旅途中與各種怪物相遇，
並培育、配種怪物，以此來和強敵展開戰鬥。
 
立志成為最強怪物大師的皮薩羅與夥伴們的大冒險由此拉開序幕……！
 
************************
 
【本作的特徵】
 
◆以「魔界」為舞台，在不可思議的世界中展開冒險！
 
主角皮薩羅展開旅程的舞台，是怪物所統治的諸多魔界。
例如以點心構成的世界以及有大片灼熱熔岩的世界等等，將在各式各樣不可思議的世界中展開冒險。
同時魔界會隨著時間流逝產生季節與天氣變化，從而使出現的怪物和原野上的機關發生變化！
有部分怪物與地點只能在特定的季節或天氣時遇見或到達，所以每每到訪原野都會有全新的機遇和發現等待著你！
 
◆超過500種個性迥異的怪物登場！
 
各種原野和迷宮中，會有多種多樣的怪物等待著。
戰鬥時，除了能「馴服」怪物納為夥伴，怪物還有可能在戰鬥結束後爬起來希望加入隊伍。
並且還能將納為夥伴的怪物組合配種，孕育出全新的怪物。
將許多怪物納為夥伴，創造只屬於自己的隊伍吧！
 
◆包含家機版的新增內容！
 
智慧型手機版包含家機版的新增下載內容「追憶的鼴鼠迷宮」、「蝦師傅的修練迷宮」和「時之無限寶箱」。積極活用這些內容，讓冒險更加有利！
 
◆與其他玩家的隊伍切磋！
 
在通訊功能之一的「快速連戰」中，可以使用報名的隊伍與30位其他怪物大師的隊伍資料進行自動戰鬥。
還有每日一次的獎勵，可以獲得提升夥伴怪物能力值的道具，以及有機會將戰勝對手隊伍中的怪物（B級以下）納為夥伴！


************************

【推薦機型】
・iPhone11與後續機型
・iPad（第十代）與後續機型
・iPad mini（第六代）與後續機型
・iPad Air（第五代）與後續機型
・iPad Pro（第四代）與後續機型

※在設定中更改畫質可以讓遊戲更加流暢。
※若使用未推薦的機型遊玩，可能會因記憶體不足等原因導致強制結束等問題。敝公司無法替未推薦的機型提供幫助，還請諒解。

【支援OS】
iOS 13.0以上

hk.releaseNotes: 修復了應用程式內購買無法正常運作的問題。
hk.description:
"""「由 SQUARE ENIX 帶來的《勇者鬥惡龍創世小玩家》現在能在手機上遊玩了！讓你能在任何地方探索由方塊組成的世界中任何角落，收集、組裝和建造各種物品並擊敗邪惡龍王！

◆在寬廣的《勇者鬥惡龍》世界中探索旅行！
在這款「由方塊建構 RPG」中，你將扮演有建造能力的傳奇建造者！阿雷夫嘉爾德王國因為萬魔的統治者——凶惡恐怖的邪惡龍王——而陷入黑暗中。讓我們一同經歷這趟傳奇冒險，拯救阿雷夫加爾德王國吧！

◆面對凶惡的敵人！
你將會遇到史萊姆、魔像、巨龍以及其他魔物。玩家熟悉的各式《勇者鬥惡龍》魔物將威脅人類的存亡！製作武器、打造防具並和魔物們作戰以保衛你的基地。使用你的建造能力和智慧在動作戰鬥中迎戰駭人魔物！

◆ 在任何地方進行收集、組裝並建造物品！
在這個由方塊構成的世界中，任何所見之物都能當成創造素材！農場元素、製作各種物品並建造你的基地來集結同伴探索遺跡。從建築到整個城鎮，你都能自由建造，蓋出屬於你的特色城鎮。建造的能力就掌握在你的手中！

◆ 增加了獨家特色讓手機遊玩更容易！
只需要輕觸螢幕就能放置方塊，透過專門設計的游標讓破壞方塊和物品更容易。加入了方便的復原按鍵，讓你能輕鬆復原你的作品！
也能將你的建築變成建築卡片，與你的好友分享，或是掃描他們的建築，放置在你的島上！

◆ 遊戲內購加入新的追加內容
新的追加內容「Terra Incognita」提供另一片讓你能自由建造遊玩的土地！
DLC 內容包含：
•「魔毯」、「頭目怪物組」、「行星儀」、「點陣戒指」
•「追加道具組」（包含上述四項）
*請注意不要重複購買。」""

系統環境
iOS13.0 以上
iPhone8 以上（系統記憶體 3GB 以上）

※使用非建議裝置可能因記憶體不足而發生強制終止等無法預測的問題。此外也無法針對非建議裝置提供相關支援，敬請見諒。"

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想

hk.description:
********************
勇者鬥惡龍天空系列的第二作，《勇者鬥惡龍V》隆重登場！
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事將在智能手機上復蘇！
感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”！
本作是一次性買斷的！
在下載後，不需要再支付任何費用。
********************
◆序言
主人公是和父親帕帕斯一起在世界中旅行的少年。
少年在經歷了無數冒險後，逐漸成長成了青年，
踏上了繼承父親理想，尋找“天空的勇者”的旅程

感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”。
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事在智能手機上復蘇。

◆遊戲特色
・怪物夥伴系統
作為敵人與主人公戰鬥的怪物，這回將成為夥伴！
只有怪物才能使用的特技和各種咒文，將做出非常出色的表現。

・夥伴對話
可以體驗與個性豐富的夥伴們在冒險中對話的樂趣。
對話的內容會根據遊戲的進展和狀況發生各種變化！

・３６０度旋轉地圖
在鎮子和城堡中可以使地圖３６０度旋轉。
如果旋轉起來觀察的話，說不定會有新的發現？！

・ＡＩ戰鬥
值得信賴的夥伴們可以通過自己的意志進行戰鬥。
根據不同狀況使用各種“作戦”，去面對強大的敵人吧！

・賭場
有老虎機、撲克、怪物格鬥場、史萊姆賽跑這些熟悉的娛樂要素。
在漫長的旅途中也勞逸結合地娛樂一下吧。
賺到的代幣還可以兌換道具，可謂是一箭雙雕！

・雙六台
在投擲骰子，使自己成為棋子前進的巨大“雙六台”中，
在駐足的格子中會發生各種各樣的事件。
裡面還有只有在“雙六”中才能體驗到的特殊事件？！
順利走到終點的話，還可以得到稀有的道具哦！！

・觸摸史萊姆
在任天堂DS版《DQV》中登場的“觸摸史萊姆”還健在！
觸擊在一定時間內顯示的與面板顏色相同的史萊姆的非常簡單的遊戲！
不過，因而玩得入了迷的話，就會忘記時間，難以自拔。真是個高深莫測的遊戲！

--------------------
【適用OS】
iOS11.0以上

【適用機型】
iPhone5S／iPod touch(第6代)／iPad(第5代) 以上

hk.description:
全球出貨＆下載超過100萬套的
《Trials of Mana》在智慧型手機上登場！

不論過去有沒有遊玩過《聖劍傳說》系列作品，都能夠盡情享受本作品帶來的樂趣。

◆故事
從前，世界仍處在被黑暗所壟罩的時代。瑪那女神以「瑪那之劍」打倒了將世界導向毀滅的8個災厄化身--「神獸」，並將其封印在8個要石之中。
就這樣，黑暗褪去，世界就此誕生了。

瑪那女神化身為大樹陷入了沉睡，並經過了漫長的歲月……
然而卻出現了一群人，企圖從8個要石之中，再度將神獸解放出來，以獲取超越神的力量，並藉此掌握世界。於是，世界上紛爭四起……和平的時代宣告終結……

與此同時，瑪那迅速地從這世上消失，瑪那之樹也開始枯萎衰弱……

◆主角
故事開始時可以從6名角色當中選擇3人。本作採用了獨特的「三線故事」設計。根據選擇的主角與夥伴不同，將會帶來不同的冒險旅程。

◆畫質
以全3D技術呈現出美麗的瑪那世界！ 過去令人懷念的場景與角色們將以漂亮的畫質重現。

◆戰鬥系統
戰鬥系統加入了跳躍、連段攻擊、閃避敵人攻擊等多樣化動作重新打造。本作依然保有《聖劍傳說》系列傳統的「環狀指令」，還另外新增了「快捷鍵指令」。

◆成長系統
「光」或「闇」--透過「轉職」讓角色的類型與外觀產生變化！ 本作新增了4階職業，還以超過300種的「技能」重新調整成長系統，讓養成變得更加自由。

◆難度設定
分為「非常簡單、簡單、普通、困難」4個階段。如果您不擅長動作遊戲，希望以享受劇情為主的話，推薦您選擇即使全滅也能原地復活的「非常簡單」。

◆全新的編曲
本作收錄了多達60首由作曲家菊田裕樹監修的全新編曲！ 也可將音樂切換至原版的音源遊玩。

◆角色語音
由豪華配音陣容帶來的語音體驗！ 隨著隊伍組合不同，冒險中的支線對話也會改變……

◆通關後要素
觀賞完結局後，將會觸發對應各主角的嶄新篇章。在通過嶄新篇章後，便可以「繼承過關資料開始新遊戲」，還能選擇挑戰「非常困難」與極度難以通關的「沒有未來」難度。

◆其他嶄新要素
新增了可以遊玩各主角故事開端的「序章體驗」，以及《聖劍傳說》系列中大家熟悉的「仙人掌小弟」探索，還大幅更新了「種子」的種類。另外，本遊戲也支援自動儲存功能。

◆智慧型手機版本的特徵
‧翻修為便於觸控使用的選單，能夠以虛擬面板操控角色。
‧新增自動鎖定目標、自動調整鏡頭、自動戰鬥等功能。
‧可以在選項中自行選擇喜歡的畫質。
‧支援雲端儲存。
‧能夠獲得兩件初始裝備，裝備時直到Lv17都會發揮特殊效果，它們分別是增加戰鬥所獲經驗值的「拉比兔飾品」，以及增加戰鬥所獲盧克的「絲尾拉比兔飾品」。

【應用程式大小】
‧本應用程式的大小約為6.7GB。購買前請先確認裝置可用的儲存空間。
‧啟動應用程式後，於通過最初的BOSS戰後將需要下載大量資料。也可以一開始就用標題畫面的「下載」全部下載。
‧強烈建議使用Wi-Fi下載。

【遊玩人數】
1人

hk.description:
--------------------------------------------------
Due to the size of the application, the download may take a considerable amount of time to complete. The app uses 3.9GB of space. When downloading the game for the first time, you must have more than 4GB of space available on your device. Version updates for the app will use more than 4GB of space. Please ensure that there is plenty of space available on your device before downloading.
--------------------------------------------------

■Description
Selling over 5.5million copies since its release in 2000, FINAL FANTASY IX proudly returns on iOS! 
Now you can relive the adventures of Zidane and his crew in the palm of your hands!

Enjoy this classic FINAL FANTASY experience with no additional fees or purchases.


■Story
Zidane and the Tantalus Theater Troupe have kidnapped Princess Garnet, the heir of Alexandria. 
To their surprise, however, the princess herself yearned to escape the castle. 
Through a series of unusual circumstances, she and her personal guard, Steiner, fall in with Zidane and set out on an incredible journey. 
Meeting unforgettable characters like Vivi and Quina along the way, they learn about themselves, the secrets of the Crystal, and a malevolent force that threatens to destroy their world.


■Gameplay Features

・Abilities
Learn new abilities by equipping items. 
When fully mastered, these abilities can be used even without equipping items, allowing for nearly endless customization options.

・Trance
Fill your Trance gauge as you sustain hits in battle. 
When fully charged, your characters will enter Trance mode, granting them powerful new skills!

・Synthesis
Never let items go to waste. Combine two items or pieces of equipment together and make better, stronger items!

・Minigames
Whether it's Chocobo Hot and Cold, Jump Rope, or Tetra Master, there are plenty of minigames to enjoy when you're not off saving the world. 
You can even earn special item rewards!


■Additional Features
・Achievements
・7 game boosters including high speed and no encounter modes.
・Autosave
・High-definition movies and character models.



ーーーーーーー
Operating System
iOS 7.0 or later

Recommended Devices
iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus
iPad (4th Generation), iPad Air, iPad Air 2
iPad mini 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4
iPod touch (6th Generation)

We cannot guarantee proper performance on devices other than those listed above.
Please confirm your device model before downloading this app.

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.description:
《Final Fantasy III》在iPhone上堂堂登場!

世界被黑暗所籠罩，光明正在逐漸消失。
被水晶所選中的4名少年少女即將踏上冒險的旅程。

《Final Fantasy III》是FF系列中第一款銷量突破百萬的作品，有著非常重大的紀念意義。
在本作中首次出現了能夠隨時根據狀況變更當前職業的“轉職系統”，以及能夠召喚出希瓦、巴哈姆特等召喚獸的“召喚魔法”，這些要素在之後的系列作品中也一直繼承了下去，並且已經成為了系列的最大特色之一。

在3D重製版中，所有圖像都以全新的3D面貌登場，再次為《FFIII》創下了新的紀錄。

·4名主角的角色設定與設計煥然一新，並追加了新的劇情。

·3D圖像使得劇情與戰鬥的表現形式更為豐富。

·改良了系統，使得職業特性更為明顯，遊戲平衡也更加方便遊戲。

·能夠隨時中斷遊戲，並且追加中斷存檔及自動封存，強化了存檔功能。

--------------------------------------------

智慧型手機版還進行了以下改進。

·圖像對應高解析度，事件劇情的構成煥然一新。

·配合觸屏操作調整了介面。

·豐富了能夠鑒賞插圖及BGM的鑒賞模式。

·還更新了貫通職業後能獲得的頂級職業證書及莫古網路等深掘遊戲要素。
hk.releaseNotes: 標題名稱已更改。

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.description:
奔向被忘卻的過去、遙遠的未來，以及時間的盡頭……
為了拯救星球的命運，一場宏大的冒險就此拉開帷幕。

■説明
集結了「勇者鬥惡龍」的堀井雄二、「七龍珠」的鳥山明、「FINAL FANTASY」開發人員的夢幻組合所創造之名作RPG。
故事將會在「現代」「中世紀」「未來」「原始」「古代」等各個時代中穿梭並逐漸展開。

重製了操作方式、視覺效果與音效，能為玩家帶來絕佳的遊戲體驗。
也支援Apple TV與遊戲手把！
此外，遊戲中也收錄了重製版的新增地下城「次元扭曲點」「龍之聖域」。
本作將會是『超時空之鑰』的決定版。

■劇情
加爾迪亞王國建國千年慶典上，在“麗內廣場”一角，少年克羅諾巧遇一位名叫瑪爾的少女。

兩人一起逛著慶典，突然看到克羅諾青梅竹馬的好朋友露卡，正在介紹她發明的物質傳送裝置“傳送門”。
然而傳送門突然失控，將出於好奇心而站上實驗台的瑪爾卷走，消失在次元的洞穴中。

克羅諾撿起瑪爾留下的項墜，追在她身後跳進了次元的洞穴，沒想到來到了400年前的世界……

■特徴
・动态时间战斗Ver2
戰鬥中時間會不斷地流逝，角色的集氣條滿了之後玩家便能選擇指令。
敵人的位置也會不斷變化，所以請視當下的狀況選擇行動吧。

・配合技能
戰鬥中可以使用各角色的特殊能力或魔法等「技能」。
此外，還能夠使用由不同角色技能組合而成的「2人技」「3人技」等50種以上的配合技能！

・新增地下城
可以玩到每次進入形態都有所變化的「次元扭曲點」，以及要通過各式各樣任務的特別地下城「龍之聖域」！

・視覺效果與音效
保留了原作營造的氣氛，將視覺效果呈現得更為精美，也支援高解析度。
音效則在作曲家光田康典的監製下，重新收錄了所有樂曲。

・操作起來毫不礙手
改良了操作方式，讓玩家能更容易地進行遊戲。
不論是觸控操作、使用Apple TV或遊戲手把，都能夠舒適地進行遊戲。

・自動存檔
除了存檔點的「存檔」以及選單中的「中斷」以外，在地圖移動時也會自動儲存遊戲進度。
也支援雲端儲存。

--------------------------------------------
hk.releaseNotes: 修正了一個問題。

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
hk.description:
■故事
帝國曆211年，人們發現了新大陸。
您將作為移民的其中一人，以走遍這座大陸為目標。
同時，在移民們的城鎮新都――艾列比亞度過每一天。

■遊戲特徵
【透過每日的工作培育角色】
本作品中有20種以上的職業，以及超過100種與職業相關的工作。
由於可在體力勞動中鍛鍊肌力，或在動腦時鍛鍊魔力，
因此藉由工作的選擇，可培育出自己喜好的角色。

【熟練地管理以攻略迷宮】
道具、糧食、以及露營道具。
將這些行李塞進容量有限的背包，向城鎮外頭出發。
途中不僅會和魔物戰鬥，也會遇到惡劣的天氣、糧食腐敗之類的狀況吧。
此時，要繼續前進？設置帳篷休息？還是鼓起勇氣撤退呢？
一路作出判斷，並不斷地開拓未知的大陸吧！

【全新的戰鬥系統要素「3個CHA」】
在活用職業和技能的傳統回合制指令式戰鬥中，
加入了和同伴合作非常重要的獨特系統。
CHANGE敵人的狀態，累積CHAIN，利用CHANCE來重創敵人吧！

hk.description:
------------------------------
・ This application requires approximately 2.55GB to download. Please be sure to allocate the necessary amount of time and space on your device before proceeding.
・ Only one download with a large amount of data will be required while progressing through the game.
・ Since it is a large application, it will take time to download. We strongly recommend connecting to Wi-Fi when downloading.
------------------------------

[Please read before playing]

* Entering or leaving vehicles such as cars and the Garden may occasionally get your character stuck between the vehicle and terrain features, or freeze the vehicle in place. This seems to happen more often when you leave your vehicle in close proximity to impassable terrain, or when you try to enter or leave your vehicle during certain scripted events. Currently, the only fix for this is to reload a previously saved game, so please make sure to save your progress often.

* Some locations may be difficult to navigate using the Speed Boost (x3). We advise you to turn off this feature in such cases.

* Make sure to check the FAQ section of our support page for solutions to common issues:
https://support.na.square-enix.com/main.php?la=1&id=442

We apologize for any inconvenience these issues may cause, and thank you again for your interest in our product.

■Summary
FINAL FANTASY VIII was first released on February 11, 1999. Beloved by fans, this title has garnered a great deal of popularity even compared to other installments in the FINAL FANTASY franchise, selling more than 9.6 million units worldwide. And now players can enjoy FINAL FANTASY VIII on their smartphone! With renewed character CG, the world of FINAL FANTASY VIII is now more beautiful than ever before.

This installment is a remaster of FINAL FANTASY VIII for PC. This application is a one-time purchase. There will be no additional charge incurred after downloading.

■Story
It is a time of war.
The Republic of Galbadia, under the influence of the sorceress Edea, mobilizes its great armies against the other nations of the world.
Squall and other members of SeeD, an elite mercenary force, join hands with Rinoa, a resistance fighter, to fight against Galbadia's tyrannical rule and to prevent Edea from fulfilling her ultimate goal.

■FINAL FANTASY VIII: Release Features
・Guardian Force（G.F.）
G.F. are summoned creatures in FFVIII used to protect the protagonists. Call upon them in battle to unleash their might and to increase their power alongside player characters. By junctioning G.F., players will be able to enjoy greater freedom in how they approach battles.

・Drawing
Obtain magic in FFVIII by drawing (extracting) it in battle. MP does not exist and players are limited to the number they have in their possession. Magic that has been extracted can be released on the spot or stocked for later use.

・ Junctioning
This system allows players to equip G.F. and stocked magic to characters in order to increase their power.

■ Additional Features
・ Battle Assist
Max out HP and ATB gauge during battle and activate Limit Breaks at any time.
・ No Encounters
Players can choose to turn Battle Encounters on or off.
・ 3x Speed
With the exception of certain cutscenes, players can choose to proceed through the game at 3x speed.


[Minimum Requirements]
iOS 13.0 or higher

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.description:
《勇者鬥惡龍》系列第二款作品終於也登陸手機！快來探索《勇者鬥惡龍II　惡靈之神》的奇妙世界及四個經典迷宮！

本作是一個完整的幻想世界，在裡面您可以體會到每個武器的奇妙，感受到每個咒文的壯觀。
而這一切都是買斷的，只需下載一次，便不用再購買也不用再下載任何其他東西！

◆ 序言
在初代《勇者鬥惡龍》故事的100年之後，阿雷夫加爾德大地上已經建立起3個新的國家。然而長久以來的和平即將被打破，邪惡的大神官哈貢召喚來邪惡的魔物，再次將破壞與災難帶到這個世界之上。
此時，傳說中的勇者洛特的後裔，羅蕾西亞城的年輕王子挺身而出，他要找到另外兩個血脈的繼承人，共同打倒邪惡的哈貢，讓世界恢復和平。

◆ 遊戲特色
·無論是感受過勇者洛特三部曲第一部的老朋友，還是對整個系列都很陌生的新面孔，都能夠在這款遊戲中體會到一次難以忘記的旅行。

·在這個早期的開放世界冒險中，玩家可以在野外自由探索，也可以挑戰充滿魔物的迷宮，甚至還能跨越大海前往新大陸！

·簡便的直接操作
遊戲操作經過調整可以完美對應現代移動設備的縱向佈局，移動按鍵的位置也可以在單手與雙手中切換。

·與日本乃至全世界數以百萬計的玩家一起回顧這款傳奇般的RPG！由著名遊戲製作人堀井雄二先生，偉大的作曲家椙山浩一先生，以及漫畫大師鳥山明先生攜手帶來的經典。

【對應OS】
iOS12.0及以上

hk.description:
********************

《勇者鬥惡龍》系列開山之作終於登陸手機！快來體會吸引了兩代人的經典RPG的不朽魅力！

通過這款遊戲，你可以進入一個劍與魔法的完整世界！只需下載一次，便不用再購買也不用再下載任何其他東西！

********************

◆ 序言
邪惡的龍王打破了阿雷夫加爾德的和平，他奪走了光之石，令世界陷入了無盡的黑暗之中。
是時候了，繼承了洛特血脈的年輕人啊，發揮出你體內蘊藏的勇者之力，打敗龍王拯救世界吧！

◆ 遊戲特色
·系列首作
體會最初的經典，重溫數百萬日本玩家在上世紀80年代時的感動。
化身為傳說中的勇者洛特的後人，在阿雷夫戈爾德的大地上感受一段經典的冒險之旅。消滅阻礙的敵人，解開重重謎題，前往龍王的所在地！

·簡便的直接操作
遊戲操作經過調整可以完美對應現代移動設備的縱向佈局，移動按鍵的位置也可以在單手與雙手中切換。

·與日本乃至全世界數以百萬計的玩家一起回顧這款傳奇般的RPG！由著名遊戲製作人堀井雄二先生，偉大的作曲家椙山浩一先生，以及漫畫大師鳥山明先生攜手帶來的經典。

--------------------
【對應OS】
iOS12.0及以上

Window seat or aisle? Booth or table? Lone wolf or life of the party? In Is This Seat Taken?, your mission is to organize groups of people according to their preferences. It’s a cozy, no-pressure logic puzzle game where you’re in charge of who sits where.

Whether it’s the cinema, a crowded bus, a wedding reception, or a cramped taxi cab, every setting introduces new characters with specific tastes. A party guest with a sensitive nose won’t be happy sitting next to a stranger who’s wearing too much cologne. A sleepy passenger won’t be happy trying to nap on the bus next to someone listening to loud music. It’s all about reading the room to find the perfect placement!

Nat is an aspiring actor whose world gets turned upside down when they see a shape just like them on the big screen. This discovery sends Nat on a global journey to meet their hero and figure out how to fit in. Experience Nat's heartfelt story as you travel from city to city, each with its own levels, characters, and charm.

- Play seating matchmaker to please picky characters.
- Discover each character’s unique traits—relatable, outlandish, and everything in between.
- Piece together satisfying puzzles with no timers or leaderboards.
- Unlock fun new scenarios as you progress—from bus rides to banquets!

hk.description:
Incredibox 能讓你在一群快樂的節奏口技達人幫助下創作自己的音樂。選擇你的音樂風格，開始錄製、錄音並分享你的混音曲。透過嘻哈節拍、電子波、流行人聲、爵士搖擺、巴西節奏等等聲音，讓你沉醉在音樂的律動之中。此外，還可以探索社群創建的各種模組，其內容素材豐富，能讓你混音上數小時，而且無廣告或應用程式內購。

Incredibox 是遊戲，也是工具，更重要的是一種視聽體驗，所帶來的樂趣很快就成為各年齡層的熱門選擇。音樂、圖形、動畫與互動性的完美結合，讓 Incredibox 適合每個人。由於 Incredibox 讓學習變得有趣且具娛樂性，現在廣為全球各地學校使用。

怎麼玩？很簡單！將圖示拖放到虛擬人物上讓他們唱歌，然後開始創作你的音樂。找對的聲音組合，解鎖動畫合唱，增強你的旋律。

只要你的作品聽起來很棒，就儲存並分享，以盡可能獲得投票。假如你獲得足夠的票數，就能進入 Incredibox 歷史，加入 50 強排行榜！準備好展示你的作品了嗎？

你還可以從應用程式中將你的混音曲下載成 MP3 反覆聆聽！

懶得創作自己的混音曲？沒問題，讓自動模式為你播放吧！

調高音量，輕鬆一下 ;)

****************
Incredibox，來自法國里昂，於 2009 年創立的 So Far So Good 工作室的心血結晶。最初以網頁形式出現，隨後推出了移動及平板應用程式，迅速成為熱門產品。它贏得了多項獎項，並出現在各大國際媒體上，包括：BBC、Adobe、FWA、Gizmodo、Slate、Konbini、Softonic、Kotaku、Cosmopolitan、PocketGamer、AppAdvice、AppSpy、Vice、Ultralinx 等等。線上演示影片自創建以來已吸引超過 1 億訪問者。

hk.description:
JANDARMA VE SAHİL GÜVENLİK PERSONEL SINAVI JSPS PRO

ŞİMDİ KAZANMA ZAMANI!!!

JSPS PRO, Jandarma ve Sahil Güvenlik personelinin astsubaylığa geçiş, ihtisas ve misyon koruma sınavlarına hazırlanması amacıyla geliştirilmiş, kapsamlı bir eğitim ve bilgi platformudur.
Ayrıca, görevdeki personelin jandarma mevzuat konularına her an erişebilmesini sağlayarak mesleki gelişime katkı sunar.

UYGULAMA ÖZELLİKLERİ

*Güncel Kanun ve Yönetmelikler
Uygulama içerisinde yer alan tüm mevzuat sürekli güncellenmektedir. Her konudan binlerce soru bulunmakta olup, soru sayıları düzenli olarak artırılmaktadır.

* Özet Anlatımlar
Zamanın Yoksa dert etme özetler ile hazırlanmaya başla.

*Video Dersler
JSPS sınavına yönelik uzman eğitmenler tarafından hazırlanmış video derslere erişim imkânı sunulmaktadır.

*Sesli Anlatım Özelliği
Konuları dilediğiniz yerde dinleyerek zamanınızı verimli kullanabilir ve öğrenme sürecinizi hızlandırabilirsiniz.

*Bilgi Kartları
JSPS için Pratik Yapın, Konu tekrarlarını kolaylaştıran, öğrenmeyi kalıcı hale getiren bilgi kartları yer almaktadır.

*Gerçek Sınav Formatında Denemeler
Uygulamada sınav formatına uygun 100 soruluk denemeler bulunmaktadır. Bu denemeler sınava hazırlıkta önemli bir avantaj sağlar.

*Sınav Takvimi ve Bildirimler
Sınav tarihleri, yapılması gereken işlemler ve güncel duyurular anlık bildirimlerle kullanıcıya iletilir.

*Yapay Zekâ Asistanı
Sınav konularıyla ilgili merak ettiğiniz soruları yöneltebileceğiniz yapay zekâ asistanı sınav emriyle aktif hale gelir ve sınırlı süreyle kullanılabilir.

*Favorilerim, Yapılacaklar, Haberler ve Bilgilendirme Alanları
Uygulama içerisinde kişisel çalışma planı oluşturabilir, ilerlemenizi takip edebilir ve güncel gelişmelerden haberdar olabilirsiniz.

JANDARMA VE SAHİL GÜVENLİK MESLEK BİLGİSİ MODÜLÜ

Bu modül, görev sırasında ihtiyaç duyulan tüm bilgilere tek platform üzerinden ulaşma imkânı sağlar.

* Asayiş olaylarında anlık bilgi edinme
* Savunma, cezalar ve idari işlemler hakkında bilgi
* Güncel kanun ve yönetmeliklere erişim
* İdari para cezaları hakkında bilgi
* 30’dan fazla tahkikat dosyası (örnek: kasten öldürme, mala zarar verme vb.)
* Adli ve idari tahkikat hazırlama rehberi
* Tutanak hazırlama örnekleri
* Suç tasnifleri hakkında bilgi (kişilere karşı suçlar, mala karşı suçlar vb.)
* Trafik idari para cezaları hakkında detaylı bilgi
* Silah bilgisi ve kullanma yetkileri
* Kolluk etik ilkeleri
* Dilekçe ve üst yazı örnekleri

Bu özellikler sayesinde personel, görev sırasında ihtiyaç duyduğu bilgilere kolayca ulaşabilir.

NEDEN JSPS PRO?

* Kitap taşıma zorunluluğunu ortadan kaldırır.
* Güncel kanun ve yönetmeliklere ücretsiz erişim sağlar.
* Tüm kuvvet personelinin kullanabileceği en kapsamlı mobil uygulamadır.
* Kullanıcı geri bildirimlerine göre düzenli olarak güncellenir.

UYGULAMANIN KAPSADIĞI SINAVLAR

* Sözleşmeli Subaylıktan Muvazzaf Subaylığa Geçiş Sınavı
* Sözleşmeli Astsubaylıktan Muvazzaf Astsubaylığa Geçiş Sınavı
* Jandarma İhtisas Branş Sınavı
* Jandarma Misyon Koruma Sınavı
* Uzman Jandarmalıktan Astsubaylığa Geçiş Sınavı
* Uzman Erbaşlıktan Astsubaylığa Geçiş Sınavı
* Muvazzaf Subay ve Astsubay Sınavları
* Sözleşmeli Subay ve Astsubay Sınavları

JSPS PRO – ÖĞRENMENİN KALICILIĞINI ARTIRIN

Tüm bilgiler, mevzuatlar, sorular ve örnek dosyalar tek bir uygulamada toplanmıştır.
JSPS PRO ile sınavlara hazırlanmak artık çok daha kolay, sistematik ve etkili.

hk.description:
Train your brain to listen carefully with this professional speech therapy app. Three activities help you to understand sentences, follow directions, and improve language processing. If you’re looking for a speech therapy app for adults and older children with communication and cognitive impairments that takes understanding beyond single words, this app is for you. 

** Try for FREE by downloading Advanced Language Therapy Lite **

Advanced Comprehension Therapy will help you find where comprehension breaks down, then help you build it back up with 3 classic speech therapy activities targeting sentence-level listening and reading comprehension.

1) IDENTIFY the picture that matches the sentence, increasing in syntactic complexity. Start by finding the picture that matches a sentence like “The baby sleeps.” Work up to finding “The grandparent is told a secret by the child” from closely related pictures.

* 11 levels of difficulty for understanding sentences with nearly 700 unique trials
* Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension
* Includes up to 3 nouns, indirect objects, reversible sentences, & passives

2) BUILD a sentence by focusing on each word & how they all fit together. Arrange the words one-by-one to match the pictured sentence you hear. Start with 3 words and work up to 9.

* 20 sentence types in nearly 1200 unique trials
* Add up to 3 extra words for an added challenge
* Tricky "little words" like articles, pronouns, and prepositions
* Hear each word as you touch it

3) FOLLOW directions of increasing difficulty in 1-, 2-, & 3-step commands. Start with exercises like “Touch the pencil.” Work up to brain-bending challenges like “Before you touch the large yellow striped circle, touch the small blue solid star.” 

* 16 levels of difficulty for following directions
* Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension
* Includes basic, temporal, & conditional commands in a hierarchy of 1-, 2-, & 3-step directions

In All Activities:

* Enjoy 1000’s of unique stimuli with hundreds of photos
* Use hints when you get stuck so you always finish successfully
* Track progress with detailed e-mail reports 
* Record yourself on-screen and send it when you’re finished
* Repeat audio at any time, or repeat slowly for easier understanding
* Designed with adults in mind but easy enough for children to use 
* No subscriptions, no monthly bills, no Wi-Fi needed

-------------------------------------------------
Who is Advanced Comprehension Therapy For?

* Speech-Language Pathologists
* Adults with Aphasia (mild-moderate)
* Stroke & TBI Survivors
* Children with Autism or Language Learning Difficulties
* Anyone who has mastered the single words in Comprehension Therapy or Language 4-in-1 & wants to take their therapy to the next level!

-------------------------------------------------
Which Skills Does This App Target?

* Auditory Comprehension (listening)
* Reading Comprehension 
* Attention to Detail
* Working Memory (holding information)
* Nouns & Pronouns (he/she/it/they)
* Adjectives (colors, size, shading)
* Syntactic Processing (understanding grammar)
* Temporal Concepts (before/after)
* Conditional Directions (if/then)
* Problem Solving (using hint/repeat or fixing errors)

-------------------------------------------------
Download now to get started – or try it for FREE with Advanced Language Therapy Lite!

Looking for something different in a speech therapy app? We offer a wide range to choose from. Find the right one for you at tactustherapy.com/find

hk.releaseNotes: Initial support for the latest devices + some exciting news
hk.description:
Pro Camera by Moment is the manual camera app that gives you full creative control and professional-level performance, all at an affordable price. It brings us closer to what we love about our DSLR and mirrorless cameras – exposure controls, precise focus, rich colors, smooth video, crisp audio – without being complicated.

If you are looking for a powerful and easy-to-use camera app, Pro Camera is for you. We make it fast and intuitive to switch between modes, dial in your shot, and keep shooting. Plus, we give you all the manual controls you’ll need: shutter speed, ISO, white balance, focus, and more. Your favorite settings can be saved and recalled on demand.

For filmmakers – the features you need, not the ones you don’t. LUTs, color spaces, bitrates, dual-channel audio meters, real-time waveforms, fast access to frame rates, and more.

For photographers – easier than shooting on your DSLR. Shoot in RAW (even in bursts), capture brackets, and more. You can even create stunning timelapses and light trail effects (in-app purchase required). 

For everyone else – inspired by the pros we made the interface simple, fast, and easy to use. We provide getting started tips, video tutorials, and full-time customer service to get you set up.

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

GENERAL FEATURES
+ Full manual: control shutter speed, iso, exposure, focus, and white balance with easy-to-use sliders
+ Focus peaking: manually dial in your focus using highlighted in-focus regions
+ Zebra stripes: quickly determine over- and under-exposed areas in the viewfinder
+ Split focus and exposure: take control of tricky lighting scenarios
+ Viewfinder grid: choose from thirds, square, and golden ratio
+ Gyroscope: ensure your shot is level with an on-screen gyroscope and haptic feedback

PHOTOGRAPHY FEATURES
+ RAW and TIFF: shoot photos in RAW/ProRAW format for better editing, or TIFF for high-quality printing
+ RAW+JPG option: simultaneously get the best of both worlds
+ Burst mode: capture burst shots in RAW format – capture action while maintaining the uncompressed quality pros want with RAW
+ Bracketing: capture multiple exposures to stack later in your favorite editing apps

FILMMAKER FEATURES
+ Import, organize, and use your favorite LUTs
+ Color spaces: choose between Rec.709, Rec.2020 HDR, Display P3, and Apple Log (on compatible devices)
+ Codecs: shoot in HEVC, H.264, or any of the 422 ProRes variants
+ Video bitrates: get precise control over video quality with standard, medium, and high bitrate options
+ RGB histogram: dial in your video color, balance, and exposure
+ Waveform monitor: evaluate video brightness and exposure across your shot in real time
+ Audio meters: get just the right sound levels with real-time, precise, dual-channel audio levels
+ HDMI clean feed output: preview on a bigger screen
+ Video stabilization: make your videos buttery smooth
+ Video formats: change your resolution and frame rate on screen, without digging into a settings menu
+ Anamorphic: use the Moment Anamorphic lens to shoot amazing, letterbox style photos and videos, with a de-squeeze option built in

PREMIUM FEATURES (In-App Purchases)
+ Timelapse mode: capture stunning time-lapse videos
+ Slow Shutter mode: long exposure shots with motion blur or light trails

WORKS WITH
+ iPhone 16 Camera Control: get quick access to manual settings
+ Lens control: manually control which of the triple/dual lenses you want to shoot with so you can use Moment lenses over each one
+ Moment lenses: access options like anamorphic de-squeeze and distortion correction
+ Moment battery case: works with the DSLR-like shutter button on our photography cases for half-press and full-press capture. Take better photos, faster.
+ Apple Watch: use your watch as a remote to shoot photos or record videos
+ Siri Shortcuts: quick access to capture a photo or start a video

mo.description:
《勇者鬥惡龍III　傳說的起點……》，一款無論是評價還是銷量都堪稱頂峰的佳作，終於登陸到手機平台上了！
現在只需在手機上即可體驗到完整的洛特三部曲！

本作是一個完整的幻想世界，在裡面您可以體會到每個武器的奇妙，感受到每個咒文的壯觀。只需下載一次，便不用再購買也不用再下載任何其他東西！
《勇者鬥惡龍III　傳說的起點……》有著獨立的劇情，即使沒玩過《勇者鬥惡龍I》和《勇者鬥惡龍II》也可以體會到遊戲的樂趣。

◆ 序言
在16歲生日的早上，勇者奧爾特加的孩子覲見了阿拉罕的國王，並提出希望前往討伐魔王巴拉莫斯。
在旅途的前方有著什麼樣的試煉等待著我們的勇者呢，他是否能夠完成父親都沒有實現的任務？

◆ 遊戲特色

·自由編隊系統
任意選擇角色組隊，共同挑戰令人難忘的冒險！
名字、性別、職業，一切都可以自由設置！

·自由轉職
隊員可以設置為任意職業，每種職業都會有不同的狀態、裝備、技能以及能力。
儘管勇者命中註定無法轉職，但是其他角色都可以隨意轉換。
轉職之後該角色的等級會變回1級，但是在原職業中學會的技能和能力仍然會保留下來。
從僧侶轉為戰士可以給近戰系角色追加治療技能，一切組合都可以根據情況靈活變動！

·體會超過30小時的經典RPG體驗！
在各個大陸與迷宮中提升自己的等級，學會新的技能和能力。
每個人都能夠培養出獨一無二的隊伍。
同時還有收集小徽章換取強力道具的追加小遊戲。
在主線結束之後還能夠探索新的迷宮和場景。

·簡便的直接操作
遊戲操作經過調整可以完美對應現代移動設備的縱向佈局，移動按鍵的位置也可以在單手與雙手中切換。

·與日本乃至全世界數以百萬計的玩家一起回顧這款傳奇般的RPG！由著名遊戲製作人堀井雄二先生，偉大的作曲家椙山浩一先生，以及漫畫大師鳥山明先生攜手帶來的經典。

【對應OS】
iOS12.0及以上

mo.description:
------------------------------------------------------
- As this application is very large, it will take some time to download.
- This application takes up around 2GB of memory. Over 4GB of free space is required to download it, so make sure that ample spare memory is available before attempting to do so. 
------------------------------------------------------

Recommended hardware:
iPhone 5s or later, 3rd generation iPad or later, iPad mini 2 or later, iPod touch 6

Supported OS:
iOS 8.0 or later
*Please be aware that users may experience problems, such as exceptionally slow running speeds, if running this application on devices other than those outlined in the recommended hardware section.  Such devices are not suited to playing this game and there is a chance of unforeseen errors occurring if running it on them.


Outline

The smash hit RPG: Final Fantasy VII, which has sold over 11,000,000 units* worldwide, finally arrives on iOS!
*Total includes both packaged sales and downloads.

The first Final Fantasy to feature 3D backgrounds and CG movie scenes, this dramatic tale continues to be loved by numerous fans around the world. Battle stages also appear in full 3D for the first time, bringing an even greater sense of awe and spectacle to combat!

Customize your characters in any way you like using the fantastic “material” system that allows endless combinations of spells and abilities.

This product is a port based on Final Fantasy VII for PC (No changes or additions have been made to the story). 


Story

With its unshakeable monopoly over Mako energy production, the evil Shinra Electric Power Company holds tight to the reigns of world power.
One day, a Mako reactor serving the sprawling metropolis of Midgar is attacked and destroyed in a bombing raid by a revolutionary group calling themselves Avalanche. 
Cloud Strife, a former member of Shinra’s elite “Soldier” unit takes part in the raid as a mercenary hired by Avalanche and sets events in motion that will draw him and his friends into an epic struggle for the fate of the planet itself…


Special features for the iOS edition 

- Play using a simple and comfortable virtual controller designed not to obscure the action, choosing between virtual analogue or fixed 4-way digital control pad options. The opacity of on-screen controls can also be adjusted from the Config Menu.

- Two new features to make play easier and more convenient!
The iOS edition also includes an option to turn enemy encounters off on the world and area maps (will not skip event battles) and a Max Stats command to become all-powerful in the blink of an eye.


Major game controls

Movement: Virtual joypad (Select between analogue and digital modes)
Menu navigation: Fixed digital buttons
Confirm: A button
Cancel: B button
Open menu: Y button

mo.description:
《勇者鬥惡龍 怪物仙境3 魔族王子與艾爾芙的旅程》登陸智慧型手機！
 
用「勇者鬥惡龍」系列耳熟能詳的怪物組建隊伍，享受怪物間驚險刺激的戰鬥吧！不僅能把在原野上遇到的怪物納為夥伴，還能將怪物配種，孕育出只屬於自己的怪物。
在本作中將有超過500種怪物登場！
在本作當中，過去「勇者鬥惡龍 怪物仙境」系列作品的配種系統將全面進化，可以用全新的組合，孕育出各種耳熟能詳的怪物、魔王以及初次登場的怪物並納入夥伴。

為了成為最強的怪物大師，踏上旅程吧！
 
※手機版的通訊對戰功能不支援家機版的即時對戰內容「線上對戰」。
 
************************
 
【故事】
 
◆被下了詛咒的皮薩羅與可靠夥伴們的冒險記
 
皮薩羅的魔王父親對他下了「無法攻擊怪物」的詛咒，
因此他決心成為與怪物並肩作戰的怪物大師。
 
皮薩羅在旅途中與各種怪物相遇，
並培育、配種怪物，以此來和強敵展開戰鬥。
 
立志成為最強怪物大師的皮薩羅與夥伴們的大冒險由此拉開序幕……！
 
************************
 
【本作的特徵】
 
◆以「魔界」為舞台，在不可思議的世界中展開冒險！
 
主角皮薩羅展開旅程的舞台，是怪物所統治的諸多魔界。
例如以點心構成的世界以及有大片灼熱熔岩的世界等等，將在各式各樣不可思議的世界中展開冒險。
同時魔界會隨著時間流逝產生季節與天氣變化，從而使出現的怪物和原野上的機關發生變化！
有部分怪物與地點只能在特定的季節或天氣時遇見或到達，所以每每到訪原野都會有全新的機遇和發現等待著你！
 
◆超過500種個性迥異的怪物登場！
 
各種原野和迷宮中，會有多種多樣的怪物等待著。
戰鬥時，除了能「馴服」怪物納為夥伴，怪物還有可能在戰鬥結束後爬起來希望加入隊伍。
並且還能將納為夥伴的怪物組合配種，孕育出全新的怪物。
將許多怪物納為夥伴，創造只屬於自己的隊伍吧！
 
◆包含家機版的新增內容！
 
智慧型手機版包含家機版的新增下載內容「追憶的鼴鼠迷宮」、「蝦師傅的修練迷宮」和「時之無限寶箱」。積極活用這些內容，讓冒險更加有利！
 
◆與其他玩家的隊伍切磋！
 
在通訊功能之一的「快速連戰」中，可以使用報名的隊伍與30位其他怪物大師的隊伍資料進行自動戰鬥。
還有每日一次的獎勵，可以獲得提升夥伴怪物能力值的道具，以及有機會將戰勝對手隊伍中的怪物（B級以下）納為夥伴！


************************

【推薦機型】
・iPhone11與後續機型
・iPad（第十代）與後續機型
・iPad mini（第六代）與後續機型
・iPad Air（第五代）與後續機型
・iPad Pro（第四代）與後續機型

※在設定中更改畫質可以讓遊戲更加流暢。
※若使用未推薦的機型遊玩，可能會因記憶體不足等原因導致強制結束等問題。敝公司無法替未推薦的機型提供幫助，還請諒解。

【支援OS】
iOS 13.0以上

mo.trackName: 勇者鬥惡龍 創世小玩家
mo.releaseNotes: 修復了應用程式內購買無法正常運作的問題。
mo.description:
"""「由 SQUARE ENIX 帶來的《勇者鬥惡龍創世小玩家》現在能在手機上遊玩了！讓你能在任何地方探索由方塊組成的世界中任何角落，收集、組裝和建造各種物品並擊敗邪惡龍王！

◆在寬廣的《勇者鬥惡龍》世界中探索旅行！
在這款「由方塊建構 RPG」中，你將扮演有建造能力的傳奇建造者！阿雷夫嘉爾德王國因為萬魔的統治者——凶惡恐怖的邪惡龍王——而陷入黑暗中。讓我們一同經歷這趟傳奇冒險，拯救阿雷夫加爾德王國吧！

◆面對凶惡的敵人！
你將會遇到史萊姆、魔像、巨龍以及其他魔物。玩家熟悉的各式《勇者鬥惡龍》魔物將威脅人類的存亡！製作武器、打造防具並和魔物們作戰以保衛你的基地。使用你的建造能力和智慧在動作戰鬥中迎戰駭人魔物！

◆ 在任何地方進行收集、組裝並建造物品！
在這個由方塊構成的世界中，任何所見之物都能當成創造素材！農場元素、製作各種物品並建造你的基地來集結同伴探索遺跡。從建築到整個城鎮，你都能自由建造，蓋出屬於你的特色城鎮。建造的能力就掌握在你的手中！

◆ 增加了獨家特色讓手機遊玩更容易！
只需要輕觸螢幕就能放置方塊，透過專門設計的游標讓破壞方塊和物品更容易。加入了方便的復原按鍵，讓你能輕鬆復原你的作品！
也能將你的建築變成建築卡片，與你的好友分享，或是掃描他們的建築，放置在你的島上！

◆ 遊戲內購加入新的追加內容
新的追加內容「Terra Incognita」提供另一片讓你能自由建造遊玩的土地！
DLC 內容包含：
•「魔毯」、「頭目怪物組」、「行星儀」、「點陣戒指」
•「追加道具組」（包含上述四項）
*請注意不要重複購買。」""

系統環境
iOS13.0 以上
iPhone8 以上（系統記憶體 3GB 以上）

※使用非建議裝置可能因記憶體不足而發生強制終止等無法預測的問題。此外也無法針對非建議裝置提供相關支援，敬請見諒。"

mo.releaseNotes: 小問題的修正。
mo.description:
********************
勇者鬥惡龍天空系列的第二作，《勇者鬥惡龍V》隆重登場！
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事將在智能手機上復蘇！
感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”！
本作是一次性買斷的！
在下載後，不需要再支付任何費用。
********************
◆序言
主人公是和父親帕帕斯一起在世界中旅行的少年。
少年在經歷了無數冒險後，逐漸成長成了青年，
踏上了繼承父親理想，尋找“天空的勇者”的旅程

感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”。
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事在智能手機上復蘇。

◆遊戲特色
・怪物夥伴系統
作為敵人與主人公戰鬥的怪物，這回將成為夥伴！
只有怪物才能使用的特技和各種咒文，將做出非常出色的表現。

・夥伴對話
可以體驗與個性豐富的夥伴們在冒險中對話的樂趣。
對話的內容會根據遊戲的進展和狀況發生各種變化！

・３６０度旋轉地圖
在鎮子和城堡中可以使地圖３６０度旋轉。
如果旋轉起來觀察的話，說不定會有新的發現？！

・ＡＩ戰鬥
值得信賴的夥伴們可以通過自己的意志進行戰鬥。
根據不同狀況使用各種“作戦”，去面對強大的敵人吧！

・賭場
有老虎機、撲克、怪物格鬥場、史萊姆賽跑這些熟悉的娛樂要素。
在漫長的旅途中也勞逸結合地娛樂一下吧。
賺到的代幣還可以兌換道具，可謂是一箭雙雕！

・雙六台
在投擲骰子，使自己成為棋子前進的巨大“雙六台”中，
在駐足的格子中會發生各種各樣的事件。
裡面還有只有在“雙六”中才能體驗到的特殊事件？！
順利走到終點的話，還可以得到稀有的道具哦！！

・觸摸史萊姆
在任天堂DS版《DQV》中登場的“觸摸史萊姆”還健在！
觸擊在一定時間內顯示的與面板顏色相同的史萊姆的非常簡單的遊戲！
不過，因而玩得入了迷的話，就會忘記時間，難以自拔。真是個高深莫測的遊戲！

--------------------
【適用OS】
iOS11.0以上

【適用機型】
iPhone5S／iPod touch(第6代)／iPad(第5代) 以上

mo.description:
全球出貨＆下載超過100萬套的
《Trials of Mana》在智慧型手機上登場！

不論過去有沒有遊玩過《聖劍傳說》系列作品，都能夠盡情享受本作品帶來的樂趣。

◆故事
從前，世界仍處在被黑暗所壟罩的時代。瑪那女神以「瑪那之劍」打倒了將世界導向毀滅的8個災厄化身--「神獸」，並將其封印在8個要石之中。
就這樣，黑暗褪去，世界就此誕生了。

瑪那女神化身為大樹陷入了沉睡，並經過了漫長的歲月……
然而卻出現了一群人，企圖從8個要石之中，再度將神獸解放出來，以獲取超越神的力量，並藉此掌握世界。於是，世界上紛爭四起……和平的時代宣告終結……

與此同時，瑪那迅速地從這世上消失，瑪那之樹也開始枯萎衰弱……

◆主角
故事開始時可以從6名角色當中選擇3人。本作採用了獨特的「三線故事」設計。根據選擇的主角與夥伴不同，將會帶來不同的冒險旅程。

◆畫質
以全3D技術呈現出美麗的瑪那世界！ 過去令人懷念的場景與角色們將以漂亮的畫質重現。

◆戰鬥系統
戰鬥系統加入了跳躍、連段攻擊、閃避敵人攻擊等多樣化動作重新打造。本作依然保有《聖劍傳說》系列傳統的「環狀指令」，還另外新增了「快捷鍵指令」。

◆成長系統
「光」或「闇」--透過「轉職」讓角色的類型與外觀產生變化！ 本作新增了4階職業，還以超過300種的「技能」重新調整成長系統，讓養成變得更加自由。

◆難度設定
分為「非常簡單、簡單、普通、困難」4個階段。如果您不擅長動作遊戲，希望以享受劇情為主的話，推薦您選擇即使全滅也能原地復活的「非常簡單」。

◆全新的編曲
本作收錄了多達60首由作曲家菊田裕樹監修的全新編曲！ 也可將音樂切換至原版的音源遊玩。

◆角色語音
由豪華配音陣容帶來的語音體驗！ 隨著隊伍組合不同，冒險中的支線對話也會改變……

◆通關後要素
觀賞完結局後，將會觸發對應各主角的嶄新篇章。在通過嶄新篇章後，便可以「繼承過關資料開始新遊戲」，還能選擇挑戰「非常困難」與極度難以通關的「沒有未來」難度。

◆其他嶄新要素
新增了可以遊玩各主角故事開端的「序章體驗」，以及《聖劍傳說》系列中大家熟悉的「仙人掌小弟」探索，還大幅更新了「種子」的種類。另外，本遊戲也支援自動儲存功能。

◆智慧型手機版本的特徵
‧翻修為便於觸控使用的選單，能夠以虛擬面板操控角色。
‧新增自動鎖定目標、自動調整鏡頭、自動戰鬥等功能。
‧可以在選項中自行選擇喜歡的畫質。
‧支援雲端儲存。
‧能夠獲得兩件初始裝備，裝備時直到Lv17都會發揮特殊效果，它們分別是增加戰鬥所獲經驗值的「拉比兔飾品」，以及增加戰鬥所獲盧克的「絲尾拉比兔飾品」。

【應用程式大小】
‧本應用程式的大小約為6.7GB。購買前請先確認裝置可用的儲存空間。
‧啟動應用程式後，於通過最初的BOSS戰後將需要下載大量資料。也可以一開始就用標題畫面的「下載」全部下載。
‧強烈建議使用Wi-Fi下載。

【遊玩人數】
1人

mo.description:
--------------------------------------------------
Due to the size of the application, the download may take a considerable amount of time to complete. The app uses 3.9GB of space. When downloading the game for the first time, you must have more than 4GB of space available on your device. Version updates for the app will use more than 4GB of space. Please ensure that there is plenty of space available on your device before downloading.
--------------------------------------------------

■Description
Selling over 5.5million copies since its release in 2000, FINAL FANTASY IX proudly returns on iOS! 
Now you can relive the adventures of Zidane and his crew in the palm of your hands!

Enjoy this classic FINAL FANTASY experience with no additional fees or purchases.


■Story
Zidane and the Tantalus Theater Troupe have kidnapped Princess Garnet, the heir of Alexandria. 
To their surprise, however, the princess herself yearned to escape the castle. 
Through a series of unusual circumstances, she and her personal guard, Steiner, fall in with Zidane and set out on an incredible journey. 
Meeting unforgettable characters like Vivi and Quina along the way, they learn about themselves, the secrets of the Crystal, and a malevolent force that threatens to destroy their world.


■Gameplay Features

・Abilities
Learn new abilities by equipping items. 
When fully mastered, these abilities can be used even without equipping items, allowing for nearly endless customization options.

・Trance
Fill your Trance gauge as you sustain hits in battle. 
When fully charged, your characters will enter Trance mode, granting them powerful new skills!

・Synthesis
Never let items go to waste. Combine two items or pieces of equipment together and make better, stronger items!

・Minigames
Whether it's Chocobo Hot and Cold, Jump Rope, or Tetra Master, there are plenty of minigames to enjoy when you're not off saving the world. 
You can even earn special item rewards!


■Additional Features
・Achievements
・7 game boosters including high speed and no encounter modes.
・Autosave
・High-definition movies and character models.



ーーーーーーー
Operating System
iOS 7.0 or later

Recommended Devices
iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus
iPad (4th Generation), iPad Air, iPad Air 2
iPad mini 2, iPad mini 3, iPad mini 4
iPod touch (6th Generation)

We cannot guarantee proper performance on devices other than those listed above.
Please confirm your device model before downloading this app.

mo.releaseNotes: 標題名稱已更改。
mo.description:
《Final Fantasy III》在iPhone上堂堂登場!

世界被黑暗所籠罩，光明正在逐漸消失。
被水晶所選中的4名少年少女即將踏上冒險的旅程。

《Final Fantasy III》是FF系列中第一款銷量突破百萬的作品，有著非常重大的紀念意義。
在本作中首次出現了能夠隨時根據狀況變更當前職業的“轉職系統”，以及能夠召喚出希瓦、巴哈姆特等召喚獸的“召喚魔法”，這些要素在之後的系列作品中也一直繼承了下去，並且已經成為了系列的最大特色之一。

在3D重製版中，所有圖像都以全新的3D面貌登場，再次為《FFIII》創下了新的紀錄。

·4名主角的角色設定與設計煥然一新，並追加了新的劇情。

·3D圖像使得劇情與戰鬥的表現形式更為豐富。

·改良了系統，使得職業特性更為明顯，遊戲平衡也更加方便遊戲。

·能夠隨時中斷遊戲，並且追加中斷存檔及自動封存，強化了存檔功能。

--------------------------------------------

智慧型手機版還進行了以下改進。

·圖像對應高解析度，事件劇情的構成煥然一新。

·配合觸屏操作調整了介面。

·豐富了能夠鑒賞插圖及BGM的鑒賞模式。

·還更新了貫通職業後能獲得的頂級職業證書及莫古網路等深掘遊戲要素。

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.releaseNotes: 修正了一個問題。
mo.description:
奔向被忘卻的過去、遙遠的未來，以及時間的盡頭……
為了拯救星球的命運，一場宏大的冒險就此拉開帷幕。

■説明
集結了「勇者鬥惡龍」的堀井雄二、「七龍珠」的鳥山明、「FINAL FANTASY」開發人員的夢幻組合所創造之名作RPG。
故事將會在「現代」「中世紀」「未來」「原始」「古代」等各個時代中穿梭並逐漸展開。

重製了操作方式、視覺效果與音效，能為玩家帶來絕佳的遊戲體驗。
也支援Apple TV與遊戲手把！
此外，遊戲中也收錄了重製版的新增地下城「次元扭曲點」「龍之聖域」。
本作將會是『超時空之鑰』的決定版。

■劇情
加爾迪亞王國建國千年慶典上，在“麗內廣場”一角，少年克羅諾巧遇一位名叫瑪爾的少女。

兩人一起逛著慶典，突然看到克羅諾青梅竹馬的好朋友露卡，正在介紹她發明的物質傳送裝置“傳送門”。
然而傳送門突然失控，將出於好奇心而站上實驗台的瑪爾卷走，消失在次元的洞穴中。

克羅諾撿起瑪爾留下的項墜，追在她身後跳進了次元的洞穴，沒想到來到了400年前的世界……

■特徴
・动态时间战斗Ver2
戰鬥中時間會不斷地流逝，角色的集氣條滿了之後玩家便能選擇指令。
敵人的位置也會不斷變化，所以請視當下的狀況選擇行動吧。

・配合技能
戰鬥中可以使用各角色的特殊能力或魔法等「技能」。
此外，還能夠使用由不同角色技能組合而成的「2人技」「3人技」等50種以上的配合技能！

・新增地下城
可以玩到每次進入形態都有所變化的「次元扭曲點」，以及要通過各式各樣任務的特別地下城「龍之聖域」！

・視覺效果與音效
保留了原作營造的氣氛，將視覺效果呈現得更為精美，也支援高解析度。
音效則在作曲家光田康典的監製下，重新收錄了所有樂曲。

・操作起來毫不礙手
改良了操作方式，讓玩家能更容易地進行遊戲。
不論是觸控操作、使用Apple TV或遊戲手把，都能夠舒適地進行遊戲。

・自動存檔
除了存檔點的「存檔」以及選單中的「中斷」以外，在地圖移動時也會自動儲存遊戲進度。
也支援雲端儲存。

--------------------------------------------

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
mo.description:
■故事
帝國曆211年，人們發現了新大陸。
您將作為移民的其中一人，以走遍這座大陸為目標。
同時，在移民們的城鎮新都――艾列比亞度過每一天。

■遊戲特徵
【透過每日的工作培育角色】
本作品中有20種以上的職業，以及超過100種與職業相關的工作。
由於可在體力勞動中鍛鍊肌力，或在動腦時鍛鍊魔力，
因此藉由工作的選擇，可培育出自己喜好的角色。

【熟練地管理以攻略迷宮】
道具、糧食、以及露營道具。
將這些行李塞進容量有限的背包，向城鎮外頭出發。
途中不僅會和魔物戰鬥，也會遇到惡劣的天氣、糧食腐敗之類的狀況吧。
此時，要繼續前進？設置帳篷休息？還是鼓起勇氣撤退呢？
一路作出判斷，並不斷地開拓未知的大陸吧！

【全新的戰鬥系統要素「3個CHA」】
在活用職業和技能的傳統回合制指令式戰鬥中，
加入了和同伴合作非常重要的獨特系統。
CHANGE敵人的狀態，累積CHAIN，利用CHANCE來重創敵人吧！

mo.description:
------------------------------
・ This application requires approximately 2.55GB to download. Please be sure to allocate the necessary amount of time and space on your device before proceeding.
・ Only one download with a large amount of data will be required while progressing through the game.
・ Since it is a large application, it will take time to download. We strongly recommend connecting to Wi-Fi when downloading.
------------------------------

[Please read before playing]

* Entering or leaving vehicles such as cars and the Garden may occasionally get your character stuck between the vehicle and terrain features, or freeze the vehicle in place. This seems to happen more often when you leave your vehicle in close proximity to impassable terrain, or when you try to enter or leave your vehicle during certain scripted events. Currently, the only fix for this is to reload a previously saved game, so please make sure to save your progress often.

* Some locations may be difficult to navigate using the Speed Boost (x3). We advise you to turn off this feature in such cases.

* Make sure to check the FAQ section of our support page for solutions to common issues:
https://support.na.square-enix.com/main.php?la=1&id=442

We apologize for any inconvenience these issues may cause, and thank you again for your interest in our product.

■Summary
FINAL FANTASY VIII was first released on February 11, 1999. Beloved by fans, this title has garnered a great deal of popularity even compared to other installments in the FINAL FANTASY franchise, selling more than 9.6 million units worldwide. And now players can enjoy FINAL FANTASY VIII on their smartphone! With renewed character CG, the world of FINAL FANTASY VIII is now more beautiful than ever before.

This installment is a remaster of FINAL FANTASY VIII for PC. This application is a one-time purchase. There will be no additional charge incurred after downloading.

■Story
It is a time of war.
The Republic of Galbadia, under the influence of the sorceress Edea, mobilizes its great armies against the other nations of the world.
Squall and other members of SeeD, an elite mercenary force, join hands with Rinoa, a resistance fighter, to fight against Galbadia's tyrannical rule and to prevent Edea from fulfilling her ultimate goal.

■FINAL FANTASY VIII: Release Features
・Guardian Force（G.F.）
G.F. are summoned creatures in FFVIII used to protect the protagonists. Call upon them in battle to unleash their might and to increase their power alongside player characters. By junctioning G.F., players will be able to enjoy greater freedom in how they approach battles.

・Drawing
Obtain magic in FFVIII by drawing (extracting) it in battle. MP does not exist and players are limited to the number they have in their possession. Magic that has been extracted can be released on the spot or stocked for later use.

・ Junctioning
This system allows players to equip G.F. and stocked magic to characters in order to increase their power.

■ Additional Features
・ Battle Assist
Max out HP and ATB gauge during battle and activate Limit Breaks at any time.
・ No Encounters
Players can choose to turn Battle Encounters on or off.
・ 3x Speed
With the exception of certain cutscenes, players can choose to proceed through the game at 3x speed.


[Minimum Requirements]
iOS 13.0 or higher

mo.description:
《勇者鬥惡龍》系列第二款作品終於也登陸手機！快來探索《勇者鬥惡龍II　惡靈之神》的奇妙世界及四個經典迷宮！

本作是一個完整的幻想世界，在裡面您可以體會到每個武器的奇妙，感受到每個咒文的壯觀。
而這一切都是買斷的，只需下載一次，便不用再購買也不用再下載任何其他東西！

◆ 序言
在初代《勇者鬥惡龍》故事的100年之後，阿雷夫加爾德大地上已經建立起3個新的國家。然而長久以來的和平即將被打破，邪惡的大神官哈貢召喚來邪惡的魔物，再次將破壞與災難帶到這個世界之上。
此時，傳說中的勇者洛特的後裔，羅蕾西亞城的年輕王子挺身而出，他要找到另外兩個血脈的繼承人，共同打倒邪惡的哈貢，讓世界恢復和平。

◆ 遊戲特色
·無論是感受過勇者洛特三部曲第一部的老朋友，還是對整個系列都很陌生的新面孔，都能夠在這款遊戲中體會到一次難以忘記的旅行。

·在這個早期的開放世界冒險中，玩家可以在野外自由探索，也可以挑戰充滿魔物的迷宮，甚至還能跨越大海前往新大陸！

·簡便的直接操作
遊戲操作經過調整可以完美對應現代移動設備的縱向佈局，移動按鍵的位置也可以在單手與雙手中切換。

·與日本乃至全世界數以百萬計的玩家一起回顧這款傳奇般的RPG！由著名遊戲製作人堀井雄二先生，偉大的作曲家椙山浩一先生，以及漫畫大師鳥山明先生攜手帶來的經典。

【對應OS】
iOS12.0及以上

mo.description:
********************

《勇者鬥惡龍》系列開山之作終於登陸手機！快來體會吸引了兩代人的經典RPG的不朽魅力！

通過這款遊戲，你可以進入一個劍與魔法的完整世界！只需下載一次，便不用再購買也不用再下載任何其他東西！

********************

◆ 序言
邪惡的龍王打破了阿雷夫加爾德的和平，他奪走了光之石，令世界陷入了無盡的黑暗之中。
是時候了，繼承了洛特血脈的年輕人啊，發揮出你體內蘊藏的勇者之力，打敗龍王拯救世界吧！

◆ 遊戲特色
·系列首作
體會最初的經典，重溫數百萬日本玩家在上世紀80年代時的感動。
化身為傳說中的勇者洛特的後人，在阿雷夫戈爾德的大地上感受一段經典的冒險之旅。消滅阻礙的敵人，解開重重謎題，前往龍王的所在地！

·簡便的直接操作
遊戲操作經過調整可以完美對應現代移動設備的縱向佈局，移動按鍵的位置也可以在單手與雙手中切換。

·與日本乃至全世界數以百萬計的玩家一起回顧這款傳奇般的RPG！由著名遊戲製作人堀井雄二先生，偉大的作曲家椙山浩一先生，以及漫畫大師鳥山明先生攜手帶來的經典。

--------------------
【對應OS】
iOS12.0及以上

Window seat or aisle? Booth or table? Lone wolf or life of the party? In Is This Seat Taken?, your mission is to organize groups of people according to their preferences. It’s a cozy, no-pressure logic puzzle game where you’re in charge of who sits where.

Whether it’s the cinema, a crowded bus, a wedding reception, or a cramped taxi cab, every setting introduces new characters with specific tastes. A party guest with a sensitive nose won’t be happy sitting next to a stranger who’s wearing too much cologne. A sleepy passenger won’t be happy trying to nap on the bus next to someone listening to loud music. It’s all about reading the room to find the perfect placement!

Nat is an aspiring actor whose world gets turned upside down when they see a shape just like them on the big screen. This discovery sends Nat on a global journey to meet their hero and figure out how to fit in. Experience Nat's heartfelt story as you travel from city to city, each with its own levels, characters, and charm.

- Play seating matchmaker to please picky characters.
- Discover each character’s unique traits—relatable, outlandish, and everything in between.
- Piece together satisfying puzzles with no timers or leaderboards.
- Unlock fun new scenarios as you progress—from bus rides to banquets!

mo.description:
Incredibox 能讓你在一群快樂的節奏口技達人幫助下創作自己的音樂。選擇你的音樂風格，開始錄製、錄音並分享你的混音曲。透過嘻哈節拍、電子波、流行人聲、爵士搖擺、巴西節奏等等聲音，讓你沉醉在音樂的律動之中。此外，還可以探索社群創建的各種模組，其內容素材豐富，能讓你混音上數小時，而且無廣告或應用程式內購。

Incredibox 是遊戲，也是工具，更重要的是一種視聽體驗，所帶來的樂趣很快就成為各年齡層的熱門選擇。音樂、圖形、動畫與互動性的完美結合，讓 Incredibox 適合每個人。由於 Incredibox 讓學習變得有趣且具娛樂性，現在廣為全球各地學校使用。

怎麼玩？很簡單！將圖示拖放到虛擬人物上讓他們唱歌，然後開始創作你的音樂。找對的聲音組合，解鎖動畫合唱，增強你的旋律。

只要你的作品聽起來很棒，就儲存並分享，以盡可能獲得投票。假如你獲得足夠的票數，就能進入 Incredibox 歷史，加入 50 強排行榜！準備好展示你的作品了嗎？

你還可以從應用程式中將你的混音曲下載成 MP3 反覆聆聽！

懶得創作自己的混音曲？沒問題，讓自動模式為你播放吧！

調高音量，輕鬆一下 ;)

****************
Incredibox，來自法國里昂，於 2009 年創立的 So Far So Good 工作室的心血結晶。最初以網頁形式出現，隨後推出了移動及平板應用程式，迅速成為熱門產品。它贏得了多項獎項，並出現在各大國際媒體上，包括：BBC、Adobe、FWA、Gizmodo、Slate、Konbini、Softonic、Kotaku、Cosmopolitan、PocketGamer、AppAdvice、AppSpy、Vice、Ultralinx 等等。線上演示影片自創建以來已吸引超過 1 億訪問者。

mo.description:
JANDARMA VE SAHİL GÜVENLİK PERSONEL SINAVI JSPS PRO

ŞİMDİ KAZANMA ZAMANI!!!

JSPS PRO, Jandarma ve Sahil Güvenlik personelinin astsubaylığa geçiş, ihtisas ve misyon koruma sınavlarına hazırlanması amacıyla geliştirilmiş, kapsamlı bir eğitim ve bilgi platformudur.
Ayrıca, görevdeki personelin jandarma mevzuat konularına her an erişebilmesini sağlayarak mesleki gelişime katkı sunar.

UYGULAMA ÖZELLİKLERİ

*Güncel Kanun ve Yönetmelikler
Uygulama içerisinde yer alan tüm mevzuat sürekli güncellenmektedir. Her konudan binlerce soru bulunmakta olup, soru sayıları düzenli olarak artırılmaktadır.

* Özet Anlatımlar
Zamanın Yoksa dert etme özetler ile hazırlanmaya başla.

*Video Dersler
JSPS sınavına yönelik uzman eğitmenler tarafından hazırlanmış video derslere erişim imkânı sunulmaktadır.

*Sesli Anlatım Özelliği
Konuları dilediğiniz yerde dinleyerek zamanınızı verimli kullanabilir ve öğrenme sürecinizi hızlandırabilirsiniz.

*Bilgi Kartları
JSPS için Pratik Yapın, Konu tekrarlarını kolaylaştıran, öğrenmeyi kalıcı hale getiren bilgi kartları yer almaktadır.

*Gerçek Sınav Formatında Denemeler
Uygulamada sınav formatına uygun 100 soruluk denemeler bulunmaktadır. Bu denemeler sınava hazırlıkta önemli bir avantaj sağlar.

*Sınav Takvimi ve Bildirimler
Sınav tarihleri, yapılması gereken işlemler ve güncel duyurular anlık bildirimlerle kullanıcıya iletilir.

*Yapay Zekâ Asistanı
Sınav konularıyla ilgili merak ettiğiniz soruları yöneltebileceğiniz yapay zekâ asistanı sınav emriyle aktif hale gelir ve sınırlı süreyle kullanılabilir.

*Favorilerim, Yapılacaklar, Haberler ve Bilgilendirme Alanları
Uygulama içerisinde kişisel çalışma planı oluşturabilir, ilerlemenizi takip edebilir ve güncel gelişmelerden haberdar olabilirsiniz.

JANDARMA VE SAHİL GÜVENLİK MESLEK BİLGİSİ MODÜLÜ

Bu modül, görev sırasında ihtiyaç duyulan tüm bilgilere tek platform üzerinden ulaşma imkânı sağlar.

* Asayiş olaylarında anlık bilgi edinme
* Savunma, cezalar ve idari işlemler hakkında bilgi
* Güncel kanun ve yönetmeliklere erişim
* İdari para cezaları hakkında bilgi
* 30’dan fazla tahkikat dosyası (örnek: kasten öldürme, mala zarar verme vb.)
* Adli ve idari tahkikat hazırlama rehberi
* Tutanak hazırlama örnekleri
* Suç tasnifleri hakkında bilgi (kişilere karşı suçlar, mala karşı suçlar vb.)
* Trafik idari para cezaları hakkında detaylı bilgi
* Silah bilgisi ve kullanma yetkileri
* Kolluk etik ilkeleri
* Dilekçe ve üst yazı örnekleri

Bu özellikler sayesinde personel, görev sırasında ihtiyaç duyduğu bilgilere kolayca ulaşabilir.

NEDEN JSPS PRO?

* Kitap taşıma zorunluluğunu ortadan kaldırır.
* Güncel kanun ve yönetmeliklere ücretsiz erişim sağlar.
* Tüm kuvvet personelinin kullanabileceği en kapsamlı mobil uygulamadır.
* Kullanıcı geri bildirimlerine göre düzenli olarak güncellenir.

UYGULAMANIN KAPSADIĞI SINAVLAR

* Sözleşmeli Subaylıktan Muvazzaf Subaylığa Geçiş Sınavı
* Sözleşmeli Astsubaylıktan Muvazzaf Astsubaylığa Geçiş Sınavı
* Jandarma İhtisas Branş Sınavı
* Jandarma Misyon Koruma Sınavı
* Uzman Jandarmalıktan Astsubaylığa Geçiş Sınavı
* Uzman Erbaşlıktan Astsubaylığa Geçiş Sınavı
* Muvazzaf Subay ve Astsubay Sınavları
* Sözleşmeli Subay ve Astsubay Sınavları

JSPS PRO – ÖĞRENMENİN KALICILIĞINI ARTIRIN

Tüm bilgiler, mevzuatlar, sorular ve örnek dosyalar tek bir uygulamada toplanmıştır.
JSPS PRO ile sınavlara hazırlanmak artık çok daha kolay, sistematik ve etkili.

mo.description:
Train your brain to listen carefully with this professional speech therapy app. Three activities help you to understand sentences, follow directions, and improve language processing. If you’re looking for a speech therapy app for adults and older children with communication and cognitive impairments that takes understanding beyond single words, this app is for you. 

** Try for FREE by downloading Advanced Language Therapy Lite **

Advanced Comprehension Therapy will help you find where comprehension breaks down, then help you build it back up with 3 classic speech therapy activities targeting sentence-level listening and reading comprehension.

1) IDENTIFY the picture that matches the sentence, increasing in syntactic complexity. Start by finding the picture that matches a sentence like “The baby sleeps.” Work up to finding “The grandparent is told a secret by the child” from closely related pictures.

* 11 levels of difficulty for understanding sentences with nearly 700 unique trials
* Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension
* Includes up to 3 nouns, indirect objects, reversible sentences, & passives

2) BUILD a sentence by focusing on each word & how they all fit together. Arrange the words one-by-one to match the pictured sentence you hear. Start with 3 words and work up to 9.

* 20 sentence types in nearly 1200 unique trials
* Add up to 3 extra words for an added challenge
* Tricky "little words" like articles, pronouns, and prepositions
* Hear each word as you touch it

3) FOLLOW directions of increasing difficulty in 1-, 2-, & 3-step commands. Start with exercises like “Touch the pencil.” Work up to brain-bending challenges like “Before you touch the large yellow striped circle, touch the small blue solid star.” 

* 16 levels of difficulty for following directions
* Listen, Read, & Both modes to focus on auditory, reading, or total comprehension
* Includes basic, temporal, & conditional commands in a hierarchy of 1-, 2-, & 3-step directions

In All Activities:

* Enjoy 1000’s of unique stimuli with hundreds of photos
* Use hints when you get stuck so you always finish successfully
* Track progress with detailed e-mail reports 
* Record yourself on-screen and send it when you’re finished
* Repeat audio at any time, or repeat slowly for easier understanding
* Designed with adults in mind but easy enough for children to use 
* No subscriptions, no monthly bills, no Wi-Fi needed

-------------------------------------------------
Who is Advanced Comprehension Therapy For?

* Speech-Language Pathologists
* Adults with Aphasia (mild-moderate)
* Stroke & TBI Survivors
* Children with Autism or Language Learning Difficulties
* Anyone who has mastered the single words in Comprehension Therapy or Language 4-in-1 & wants to take their therapy to the next level!

-------------------------------------------------
Which Skills Does This App Target?

* Auditory Comprehension (listening)
* Reading Comprehension 
* Attention to Detail
* Working Memory (holding information)
* Nouns & Pronouns (he/she/it/they)
* Adjectives (colors, size, shading)
* Syntactic Processing (understanding grammar)
* Temporal Concepts (before/after)
* Conditional Directions (if/then)
* Problem Solving (using hint/repeat or fixing errors)

-------------------------------------------------
Download now to get started – or try it for FREE with Advanced Language Therapy Lite!

Looking for something different in a speech therapy app? We offer a wide range to choose from. Find the right one for you at tactustherapy.com/find

mo.releaseNotes: Initial support for the latest devices + some exciting news
mo.description:
Pro Camera by Moment is the manual camera app that gives you full creative control and professional-level performance, all at an affordable price. It brings us closer to what we love about our DSLR and mirrorless cameras – exposure controls, precise focus, rich colors, smooth video, crisp audio – without being complicated.

If you are looking for a powerful and easy-to-use camera app, Pro Camera is for you. We make it fast and intuitive to switch between modes, dial in your shot, and keep shooting. Plus, we give you all the manual controls you’ll need: shutter speed, ISO, white balance, focus, and more. Your favorite settings can be saved and recalled on demand.

For filmmakers – the features you need, not the ones you don’t. LUTs, color spaces, bitrates, dual-channel audio meters, real-time waveforms, fast access to frame rates, and more.

For photographers – easier than shooting on your DSLR. Shoot in RAW (even in bursts), capture brackets, and more. You can even create stunning timelapses and light trail effects (in-app purchase required). 

For everyone else – inspired by the pros we made the interface simple, fast, and easy to use. We provide getting started tips, video tutorials, and full-time customer service to get you set up.

We love hearing from you. If you have any features, ideas, or feedback please email us at hello@shopmoment.com or DM us on Instagram @moment.

GENERAL FEATURES
+ Full manual: control shutter speed, iso, exposure, focus, and white balance with easy-to-use sliders
+ Focus peaking: manually dial in your focus using highlighted in-focus regions
+ Zebra stripes: quickly determine over- and under-exposed areas in the viewfinder
+ Split focus and exposure: take control of tricky lighting scenarios
+ Viewfinder grid: choose from thirds, square, and golden ratio
+ Gyroscope: ensure your shot is level with an on-screen gyroscope and haptic feedback

PHOTOGRAPHY FEATURES
+ RAW and TIFF: shoot photos in RAW/ProRAW format for better editing, or TIFF for high-quality printing
+ RAW+JPG option: simultaneously get the best of both worlds
+ Burst mode: capture burst shots in RAW format – capture action while maintaining the uncompressed quality pros want with RAW
+ Bracketing: capture multiple exposures to stack later in your favorite editing apps

FILMMAKER FEATURES
+ Import, organize, and use your favorite LUTs
+ Color spaces: choose between Rec.709, Rec.2020 HDR, Display P3, and Apple Log (on compatible devices)
+ Codecs: shoot in HEVC, H.264, or any of the 422 ProRes variants
+ Video bitrates: get precise control over video quality with standard, medium, and high bitrate options
+ RGB histogram: dial in your video color, balance, and exposure
+ Waveform monitor: evaluate video brightness and exposure across your shot in real time
+ Audio meters: get just the right sound levels with real-time, precise, dual-channel audio levels
+ HDMI clean feed output: preview on a bigger screen
+ Video stabilization: make your videos buttery smooth
+ Video formats: change your resolution and frame rate on screen, without digging into a settings menu
+ Anamorphic: use the Moment Anamorphic lens to shoot amazing, letterbox style photos and videos, with a de-squeeze option built in

PREMIUM FEATURES (In-App Purchases)
+ Timelapse mode: capture stunning time-lapse videos
+ Slow Shutter mode: long exposure shots with motion blur or light trails

WORKS WITH
+ iPhone 16 Camera Control: get quick access to manual settings
+ Lens control: manually control which of the triple/dual lenses you want to shoot with so you can use Moment lenses over each one
+ Moment lenses: access options like anamorphic de-squeeze and distortion correction
+ Moment battery case: works with the DSLR-like shutter button on our photography cases for half-press and full-press capture. Take better photos, faster.
+ Apple Watch: use your watch as a remote to shoot photos or record videos
+ Siri Shortcuts: quick access to capture a photo or start a video

tw.description:
《勇者鬥惡龍III　傳說的起點……》，一款無論是評價還是銷量都堪稱頂峰的佳作，終於登陸到手機平台上了！
現在只需在手機上即可體驗到完整的洛特三部曲！

本作是一個完整的幻想世界，在裡面您可以體會到每個武器的奇妙，感受到每個咒文的壯觀。只需下載一次，便不用再購買也不用再下載任何其他東西！
《勇者鬥惡龍III　傳說的起點……》有著獨立的劇情，即使沒玩過《勇者鬥惡龍I》和《勇者鬥惡龍II》也可以體會到遊戲的樂趣。

◆ 序言
在16歲生日的早上，勇者奧爾特加的孩子覲見了阿拉罕的國王，並提出希望前往討伐魔王巴拉莫斯。
在旅途的前方有著什麼樣的試煉等待著我們的勇者呢，他是否能夠完成父親都沒有實現的任務？

◆ 遊戲特色

·自由編隊系統
任意選擇角色組隊，共同挑戰令人難忘的冒險！
名字、性別、職業，一切都可以自由設置！

·自由轉職
隊員可以設置為任意職業，每種職業都會有不同的狀態、裝備、技能以及能力。
儘管勇者命中註定無法轉職，但是其他角色都可以隨意轉換。
轉職之後該角色的等級會變回1級，但是在原職業中學會的技能和能力仍然會保留下來。
從僧侶轉為戰士可以給近戰系角色追加治療技能，一切組合都可以根據情況靈活變動！

·體會超過30小時的經典RPG體驗！
在各個大陸與迷宮中提升自己的等級，學會新的技能和能力。
每個人都能夠培養出獨一無二的隊伍。
同時還有收集小徽章換取強力道具的追加小遊戲。
在主線結束之後還能夠探索新的迷宮和場景。

·簡便的直接操作
遊戲操作經過調整可以完美對應現代移動設備的縱向佈局，移動按鍵的位置也可以在單手與雙手中切換。

·與日本乃至全世界數以百萬計的玩家一起回顧這款傳奇般的RPG！由著名遊戲製作人堀井雄二先生，偉大的作曲家椙山浩一先生，以及漫畫大師鳥山明先生攜手帶來的經典。

【對應OS】
iOS12.0及以上

本作特色為「構築記憶之地」系統，只要在地圖上放置名為「聖遺物」的工藝品，就會出現城鎮、森林和居民，並展開新故事。一切故事發展都會隨著您「構築記憶之地」產生變化。

tw.description:
------------------------------------------------------
- As this application is very large, it will take some time to download.
- This application takes up around 2GB of memory. Over 4GB of free space is required to download it, so make sure that ample spare memory is available before attempting to do so. 
------------------------------------------------------

Recommended hardware:
iPhone 5s or later, 3rd generation iPad or later, iPad mini 2 or later, iPod touch 6

Supported OS:
iOS 8.0 or later
*Please be aware that users may experience problems, such as exceptionally slow running speeds, if running this application on devices other than those outlined in the recommended hardware section.  Such devices are not suited to playing this game and there is a chance of unforeseen errors occurring if running it on them.


Outline

The smash hit RPG: Final Fantasy VII, which has sold over 11,000,000 units* worldwide, finally arrives on iOS!
*Total includes both packaged sales and downloads.

The first Final Fantasy to feature 3D backgrounds and CG movie scenes, this dramatic tale continues to be loved by numerous fans around the world. Battle stages also appear in full 3D for the first time, bringing an even greater sense of awe and spectacle to combat!

Customize your characters in any way you like using the fantastic “material” system that allows endless combinations of spells and abilities.

This product is a port based on Final Fantasy VII for PC (No changes or additions have been made to the story). 


Story

With its unshakeable monopoly over Mako energy production, the evil Shinra Electric Power Company holds tight to the reigns of world power.
One day, a Mako reactor serving the sprawling metropolis of Midgar is attacked and destroyed in a bombing raid by a revolutionary group calling themselves Avalanche. 
Cloud Strife, a former member of Shinra’s elite “Soldier” unit takes part in the raid as a mercenary hired by Avalanche and sets events in motion that will draw him and his friends into an epic struggle for the fate of the planet itself…


Special features for the iOS edition 

- Play using a simple and comfortable virtual controller designed not to obscure the action, choosing between virtual analogue or fixed 4-way digital control pad options. The opacity of on-screen controls can also be adjusted from the Config Menu.

- Two new features to make play easier and more convenient!
The iOS edition also includes an option to turn enemy encounters off on the world and area maps (will not skip event battles) and a Max Stats command to become all-powerful in the blink of an eye.


Major game controls

Movement: Virtual joypad (Select between analogue and digital modes)
Menu navigation: Fixed digital buttons
Confirm: A button
Cancel: B button
Open menu: Y button

tw.description:
《勇者鬥惡龍 怪物仙境3 魔族王子與艾爾芙的旅程》登陸智慧型手機！
 
用「勇者鬥惡龍」系列耳熟能詳的怪物組建隊伍，享受怪物間驚險刺激的戰鬥吧！不僅能把在原野上遇到的怪物納為夥伴，還能將怪物配種，孕育出只屬於自己的怪物。
在本作中將有超過500種怪物登場！
在本作當中，過去「勇者鬥惡龍 怪物仙境」系列作品的配種系統將全面進化，可以用全新的組合，孕育出各種耳熟能詳的怪物、魔王以及初次登場的怪物並納入夥伴。

為了成為最強的怪物大師，踏上旅程吧！
 
※手機版的通訊對戰功能不支援家機版的即時對戰內容「線上對戰」。
 
************************
 
【故事】
 
◆被下了詛咒的皮薩羅與可靠夥伴們的冒險記
 
皮薩羅的魔王父親對他下了「無法攻擊怪物」的詛咒，
因此他決心成為與怪物並肩作戰的怪物大師。
 
皮薩羅在旅途中與各種怪物相遇，
並培育、配種怪物，以此來和強敵展開戰鬥。
 
立志成為最強怪物大師的皮薩羅與夥伴們的大冒險由此拉開序幕……！
 
************************
 
【本作的特徵】
 
◆以「魔界」為舞台，在不可思議的世界中展開冒險！
 
主角皮薩羅展開旅程的舞台，是怪物所統治的諸多魔界。
例如以點心構成的世界以及有大片灼熱熔岩的世界等等，將在各式各樣不可思議的世界中展開冒險。
同時魔界會隨著時間流逝產生季節與天氣變化，從而使出現的怪物和原野上的機關發生變化！
有部分怪物與地點只能在特定的季節或天氣時遇見或到達，所以每每到訪原野都會有全新的機遇和發現等待著你！
 
◆超過500種個性迥異的怪物登場！
 
各種原野和迷宮中，會有多種多樣的怪物等待著。
戰鬥時，除了能「馴服」怪物納為夥伴，怪物還有可能在戰鬥結束後爬起來希望加入隊伍。
並且還能將納為夥伴的怪物組合配種，孕育出全新的怪物。
將許多怪物納為夥伴，創造只屬於自己的隊伍吧！
 
◆包含家機版的新增內容！
 
智慧型手機版包含家機版的新增下載內容「追憶的鼴鼠迷宮」、「蝦師傅的修練迷宮」和「時之無限寶箱」。積極活用這些內容，讓冒險更加有利！
 
◆與其他玩家的隊伍切磋！
 
在通訊功能之一的「快速連戰」中，可以使用報名的隊伍與30位其他怪物大師的隊伍資料進行自動戰鬥。
還有每日一次的獎勵，可以獲得提升夥伴怪物能力值的道具，以及有機會將戰勝對手隊伍中的怪物（B級以下）納為夥伴！


************************

【推薦機型】
・iPhone11與後續機型
・iPad（第十代）與後續機型
・iPad mini（第六代）與後續機型
・iPad Air（第五代）與後續機型
・iPad Pro（第四代）與後續機型

※在設定中更改畫質可以讓遊戲更加流暢。
※若使用未推薦的機型遊玩，可能會因記憶體不足等原因導致強制結束等問題。敝公司無法替未推薦的機型提供幫助，還請諒解。

【支援OS】
iOS 13.0以上

tw.description:
"""「由 SQUARE ENIX 帶來的《勇者鬥惡龍創世小玩家》現在能在手機上遊玩了！讓你能在任何地方探索由方塊組成的世界中任何角落，收集、組裝和建造各種物品並擊敗邪惡龍王！

◆在寬廣的《勇者鬥惡龍》世界中探索旅行！
在這款「由方塊建構 RPG」中，你將扮演有建造能力的傳奇建造者！阿雷夫嘉爾德王國因為萬魔的統治者——凶惡恐怖的邪惡龍王——而陷入黑暗中。讓我們一同經歷這趟傳奇冒險，拯救阿雷夫加爾德王國吧！

◆面對凶惡的敵人！
你將會遇到史萊姆、魔像、巨龍以及其他魔物。玩家熟悉的各式《勇者鬥惡龍》魔物將威脅人類的存亡！製作武器、打造防具並和魔物們作戰以保衛你的基地。使用你的建造能力和智慧在動作戰鬥中迎戰駭人魔物！

◆ 在任何地方進行收集、組裝並建造物品！
在這個由方塊構成的世界中，任何所見之物都能當成創造素材！農場元素、製作各種物品並建造你的基地來集結同伴探索遺跡。從建築到整個城鎮，你都能自由建造，蓋出屬於你的特色城鎮。建造的能力就掌握在你的手中！

◆ 增加了獨家特色讓手機遊玩更容易！
只需要輕觸螢幕就能放置方塊，透過專門設計的游標讓破壞方塊和物品更容易。加入了方便的復原按鍵，讓你能輕鬆復原你的作品！
也能將你的建築變成建築卡片，與你的好友分享，或是掃描他們的建築，放置在你的島上！

◆ 遊戲內購加入新的追加內容
新的追加內容「Terra Incognita」提供另一片讓你能自由建造遊玩的土地！
DLC 內容包含：
•「魔毯」、「頭目怪物組」、「行星儀」、「點陣戒指」
•「追加道具組」（包含上述四項）
*請注意不要重複購買。」""

系統環境
iOS13.0 以上
iPhone8 以上（系統記憶體 3GB 以上）

※使用非建議裝置可能因記憶體不足而發生強制終止等無法預測的問題。此外也無法針對非建議裝置提供相關支援，敬請見諒。"
